summary.span: 在可自訂的格線中顯示資料。

span.span: Displays data in a customizable grid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項提供可自訂的資料表顯示資料。The control provides a customizable table for displaying data. 類別可讓您自訂的資料格、 資料列、 資料行和透過屬性使用的框線這類， ， ，和。The class allows customization of cells, rows, columns, and borders through the use of properties such as , , , and . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 基本格式化和樣式設定 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/basic-formatting-and-styling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Basic Formatting and Styling in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/basic-formatting-and-styling-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 您可以使用控制項來顯示資料，不論基礎資料來源。You can use a control to display data with or without an underlying data source. 如果沒有指定資料來源，您可以建立資料行和資料列包含資料，並將它們加入直接使用和屬性。Without specifying a data source, you can create columns and rows that contain data and add them directly to the using the and properties. 您也可以使用集合，以存取物件和屬性來讀取或直接寫入資料格的值。You can also use the collection to access objects and the property to read or write cell values directly. 索引子也可直接存取的資料格。The indexer also provides direct access to cells. 若要以手動方式填入控制項或者，您可以設定和屬性，以繫結到資料來源，並會自動填入資料。As an alternative to populating the control manually, you can set the and properties to bind the to a data source and automatically populate it with data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 顯示 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Displaying Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 當使用非常大量的資料，您可以設定屬性設`true`來顯示可用的資料子集。When working with very large amounts of data, you can set the property to `true` to display a subset of the available data. 虛擬模式要求來源的資料快取實作填入。Virtual mode requires the implementation of a data cache from which the control is populated. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的資料顯示模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/data-display-modes-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Data Display Modes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/data-display-modes-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需有關可用的功能控制項，請參閱[DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/datagridview-control-windows-forms.md)。For additional information about the features available in the control, see [DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/datagridview-control-windows-forms.md). 下表提供一般工作的直接連結。The following table provides direct links to common tasks. - [操作說明：將資料繫結至 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbk67b6z\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fbk67b6z\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [操作說明：將工具提示加入至 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的個別儲存格](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2249cf0a\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Add ToolTips to Individual Cells in a Windows Forms DataGridView Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2249cf0a\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [操作說明：設定 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項的字型和色彩樣式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z2akwyy7\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Set Font and Color Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z2akwyy7\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [操作說明：使用設計工具變更 Windows Forms DataGridView 資料行的類型](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/053656ss\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Change the Type of a Windows Forms DataGridView Column Using the Designer](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/053656ss\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [操作說明：使用設計工具將資料繫結至 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/33w255ac\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control Using the Designer](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/33w255ac\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [操作說明：使用設計工具設定 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項的預設儲存格樣式和資料格式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/95y5fz2x\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Set Default Cell Styles and Data Formats for the Windows Forms DataGridView Control Using the Designer](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/95y5fz2x\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [操作說明：格式化 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的資料](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9x2790s\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Format Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/f9x2790s\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [逐步解說：驗證 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的資料](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ykdxa0bc\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[Walkthrough: Validating Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ykdxa0bc\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [操作說明：自訂 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的資料格式](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z1cc356h\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/z1cc356h\(v=vs.110\).aspx) - [逐步解說：使用兩個 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項建立主從式表單](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/y8c0cxey\(v=vs.110\).aspx)[Walkthrough: Creating a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/y8c0cxey\(v=vs.110\).aspx) 雖然會取代並將功能加入至先前的版本控制如果您選擇，將會保留回溯相容性以及供未來使用的控制項。Although the control replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, the control is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Windows Forms DataGridView 和 DataGrid 控制項之間的差異](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md)。For more information, see [Differences Between the Windows Forms DataGridView and DataGrid Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/differences-between-the-windows-forms-datagridview-and-datagrid-controls.md). > [!NOTE] > 控制項繼承兩者並屬性從，但僅支援屬性。The control inherits both the and properties from , but supports only the property. 使用屬性與控制項沒有任何作用。Using the property with the control has no effect. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化未繫結控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize an unbound control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound/CS/simpleunbound.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound/VB/simpleunbound.vb#00)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會轉換成指定的資料列和資料行索引`objectID`並`childID`參數並呼叫方法多載兩次使用並的值列舉型別。This method converts the specified row and column indexes into `objectID` and `childID` parameters and calls the method overload twice using the and values of the enumeration. `objectID`和`childID`取決於其的顯示順序，如果它們是可見的且從 1 開始計算的資料列或資料行的標頭中編號只顯示資料列和資料行。The `objectID` and `childID` are determined by numbering only the visible rows and columns in their display order, counting the row or column headers if they are visible, and starting with 1. 例如，如果資料行行首為可見，`objectID`針對第一個可見的非標題資料列會是 2。For example, if column headers are visible, the `objectID` for the first visible nonheader row is 2.

span.span: Override this method when customizing the control and modifying how and when the current cell changes.

para.span: 例如，如果您建立自訂的資料列型別，將多個資料格合併至單一資料格，並據此修改導覽，您可以覆寫此方法以提供協助工具支援，您的變更。

span.span: For example, if you create a custom row type that merges multiple cells into single cells and you modify the navigation accordingly, you can override this method to provide accessibility support for your changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制在內部呼叫方法，以判斷資料行的標頭資料格的框線外觀。The control internally calls the method to determine the appearance of the borders for the column header cells. 控制項通常會使用值屬性`dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput`參數。The control typically uses the value of the property for the `dataGridViewAdvancedBorderStyleInput` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，以自訂資料行的標頭資料格的框線。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to customize the borders of the column header cells. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出是否已啟用手動重新調整資料行的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether manual column repositioning is enabled.

value.span: 如果使用者可以變更資料行順序，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the user can change the column order; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 啟用資料行重新調整位置時，使用者可以將資料行標頭拖曳到新位置。When column repositioning is enabled, users can drag a column header to a new position. 請注意，已凍結和解除凍結的資料行形成兩個不同的群組;使用者可以重新定位在群組內，資料行，但無法將資料行從一個群組移到另。Note that frozen and unfrozen columns form two separate groups; users can reposition columns within a group, but cannot move a column from one group to the other. > [!NOTE] > 控制項不支援雙重緩衝。The control does not support double buffering. 如果設定為`true`中衍生控制項，在調整大小時，資料列、 資料行或標頭，或重新排序資料行時，使用者不會接收視覺化回饋。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性在主要用於顯示的控制項。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，以數種方式自訂控制項的視覺外觀，控制項設定了有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來防止使用者以手動方式變更資料行寬度。Use this property to prevent users from manually changing column widths. 這非常有用，例如，使用僅顯示資料行，一次載入資料和資料行，會在該時間調整大小。This is useful, for example, with display-only columns where data is loaded once and columns are resized at that time. 如需有關使用者重新調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about user resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控制項不支援雙重緩衝。The control does not support double buffering. 如果設定為`true`中衍生控制項，在調整大小時，資料列、 資料行或標頭，或重新排序資料行時，使用者不會接收視覺化回饋。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性在主要用於顯示的控制項。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，以數種方式自訂控制項的視覺外觀，控制項設定了有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來防止使用者以手動方式變更的資料列高度。Use this property to prevent users from manually changing row heights. 這非常有用，例如，使用僅顯示控制項，其中一次載入資料，而且在該時間的資料列會調整大小。This is useful, for example, with display-only controls where data is loaded once and rows are resized at that time. 儲存格的內容時調整大小的資料列，分成多行換行，必須有作用中的儲存格的儲存格樣式屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 如需有關使用者重新調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about user resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控制項不支援雙重緩衝。The control does not support double buffering. 如果設定為`true`中衍生控制項，在調整大小時，資料列、 資料行或標頭，或重新排序資料行時，使用者不會接收視覺化回饋。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性在主要用於顯示的控制項。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，以數種方式自訂控制項的視覺外觀，控制項設定了有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. summary.span: 取得或設定套用至 奇數資料列的預設儲存格樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the default cell style applied to odd-numbered rows of the .

value.span: 要套用至奇數資料列的 。

span.span: A to apply to the odd-numbered rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會顯示其使用由儲存格樣式的儲存格屬性，從其他屬性的型別繼承樣式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 透過指定索引上的奇數資料列中的資料格，樣式屬性覆寫透過指定的樣式， ，和，而且會覆寫透過指定的樣式和屬性。For cells in rows with odd index numbers, the styles specified through the property override the styles specified through the , , and , and are overridden by the styles specified through the and properties. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 取得這個屬性中，當與預設值會在建立屬性已不被存取。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 取得這個屬性的多個資料列時，這會造成效能影響。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 可能的話，使用單一設定此屬性的多個資料列。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性來建立在分類帳效果控制項。The following code example illustrates how to use this property to create a ledger effect in a control. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為自動產生的資料行`true`而或屬性會設定或變更。Columns are automatically generated when this property is set to `true` and the or properties are set or changed. 資料行也可以自動產生時機屬性已從`false`來`true`。Columns can also be automatically generated when the property is changed from `false` to `true`. 如果這個屬性是`true`而變更，使不符合先前的資料行的資料行值不相符的資料行中的資料會被捨棄。If this property is `true` and the changes so there are columns that do not match the columns of the previous value, data in the unmatched columns is discarded. 如果此屬性則會忽略或沒有設定的屬性。This property is ignored if the or properties are not set. 當設定為`true`，則控制項資料來源中產生物件的每個公用屬性的一個資料行。When is set to `true`, the control generates one column for each public property of the objects in the data source. 如果繫結的物件會實作介面，控制項產生一個資料行所傳回的每一個屬性方法。If the bound objects implement the interface, the control generates one column for each property returned by the method. 每個資料行的標頭會包含資料行代表屬性名稱的值。Each column header will contain the value of the property name the column represents. 如果您設定屬性，但組到`false`，您必須以手動方式加入資料行。If you set the property but set to `false`, you must add columns manually. 您可以藉由設定每個加入的資料行繫結至資料來源的繫結的物件所公開的屬性名稱的屬性。You can bind each added column to the data source by setting the property to the name of a property exposed by the bound objects. > [!NOTE] > 設定在 Windows Form 設計工具會自動設定屬性設`false`並產生程式碼來新增並繫結資料來源中每一個屬性的資料行。Setting the in the Windows Forms Designer automatically sets the property to `false` and generates code to add and bind a column for each property in the data source. 在設計階段所產生的程式碼相當於下列範例所示的手動新增程式碼。The code that is generated at design-time is equivalent to the manually added code shown in the following example. 它不是在執行階段所發生的資料行自動產生相同時屬性設定為`true`。It is not the same as the auto-generation of columns at run-time that occurs when the property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以手動方式加入資料行，並將其繫結至資料來源設定時至`false`。The following code example demonstrates how to add columns manually and bind them to a data source when you set to `false`. 在此範例中，控制項繫結到一份`Task`商務物件。In this example, a control is bound to a list of `Task` business objects. 然後，新增資料行，並繫結至`Task`屬性，透過屬性。Then, columns are added and are bound to `Task` properties through the property. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[How to:存取 Windows Form DataGridViewComboBoxCell 下拉式清單中的物件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Access Objects in a Windows Forms DataGridViewComboBoxCell Drop-Down List](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/access-objects-in-a-wf-datagridviewcomboboxcell-drop-down-list.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewComboBoxObjectBinding/vb/form1.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. span.span: Adjusts the width of the specified column to fit the contents of all its cells, including the header cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制資料行調整大小時。This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes. 每個方法呼叫，一次調整資料行寬度如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，此資料行將不會自動調整。The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的所有資料行，請使用方法。To resize all columns, use the method. 若要設定其內容變更時自動調整大小的資料行，請使用屬性或資料行屬性。To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property or the column property. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用這個方法將資料行的寬度足夠大以容納新資料格的值。The following code example uses this method to make the column width large enough to accommodate a new cell value. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[How to:管理 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的資料列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#211](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewRowDemo.cpp#211)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#211](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewRowDemo.cs#211)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#211](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewrowdemo.vb#211)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制資料行調整大小時。This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes. 每個方法呼叫，一次調整資料行寬度如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，此資料行將不會自動調整。The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的所有資料行，請使用方法。To resize all columns, use the method. 若要設定其內容變更時自動調整大小的資料行，請使用屬性或資料行屬性。To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property or the column property. 這個多載可讓您指定計算中一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列中的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這會改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用這個方法將資料行的寬度足夠大以容納新資料格的值。The following code example uses this method to make the column width large enough to accommodate a new cell value. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[How to:管理 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的資料列](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Manipulate Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-manipulate-rows-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制資料行調整大小時。This method is useful if you want to control when a column resizes. 每個方法呼叫，一次調整資料行寬度如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，此資料行將不會自動調整。The column width is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column later change, the column will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的所有資料行，請使用方法。To resize all columns, use the method. 若要設定其內容變更時自動調整大小的資料行，請使用屬性或資料行屬性。To set the column to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property or the column property. 這個多載可讓您指定計算中一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列中的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這會改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 這個多載保護，而且設計成可讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生類別。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedHeight`已`false`，資料行寬度會進行計算時，多半認為您會呼叫或方法下一步。If `fixedHeight` is `false`, the column width will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the or method next. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制項時調整資料行行首的大小。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize. 每個方法呼叫，一次調整資料行行首的高度如果資料行的內容標頭之後變更，資料行的標頭將不會自動調整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要設定資料行標頭，自動調整大小及其內容變更時，使用屬性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 儲存格的內容時調整資料行行首的大小，分成多行換行，必須有作用中的儲存格的儲存格樣式屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何調整資料行行首的大小，並按一下 [結果] 按鈕的資料列。The following code example demonstrates how to resize column headers and rows as a result of a button click. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/VB/form1.vb#3)]

span.span: Adjusts the height of the column headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制項時調整資料行行首的大小，如果只是要繫結的資料來源中指定的資料行的標頭的內容變更使用者編輯或變更的結果。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified column have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source. 資料行行首的高度會調整一次每個方法呼叫如果內容的變更需要它;如果資料行的內容標頭之後變更，資料行的標頭將不會自動調整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要設定資料行標頭，自動調整大小及其內容變更時，使用屬性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 儲存格的內容時調整資料行行首的大小，分成多行換行，必須有作用中的儲存格的儲存格樣式屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

summary.span: 調整資料行行首的高度以適合其內容，並在預期接下來將調整資料行和/或資料列行首寬度的情況下，選擇性地計算高度。

span.span: Adjusts the height of the column headers to fit their contents, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that the column and/or row header widths will subsequently be adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制項時調整資料行行首的大小。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize. 每個方法呼叫，一次調整資料行行首的高度如果資料行的內容標頭之後變更，資料行的標頭將不會自動調整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要設定資料行標頭，自動調整大小及其內容變更時，使用屬性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 儲存格的內容時調整資料行行首的大小，分成多行換行，必須有作用中的儲存格的儲存格樣式屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 這個多載保護，而且設計成可讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生類別。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedColumnsWidth`或`fixedRowHeadersWidth`參數是`false`，將這類呼叫方法預期的情況下計算資料行行首的高度和下一步。If the `fixedColumnsWidth` or `fixedRowHeadersWidth` parameters are `false`, the height of the column headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the methods such as and next. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: protected void AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight (int columnIndex, bool fixedRowHeadersWidth, bool fixedColumnWidth);
.method familyhidebysig instance void AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight(int32 columnIndex, bool fixedRowHeadersWidth, bool fixedColumnWidth) cil managed
Protected Sub AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight (columnIndex As Integer, fixedRowHeadersWidth As Boolean, fixedColumnWidth As Boolean)
protected: void AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight(int columnIndex, bool fixedRowHeadersWidth, bool fixedColumnWidth);
member this.AutoResizeColumnHeadersHeight : int * bool * bool -> unit

param.name: columnIndex
param.span: 資料行行首的索引，應該使用該行首的內容來判斷新的高度。

span.span: The index of the column header whose contents should be used to determine new height.

param.name: fixedRowHeadersWidth
param.span: 表示根據目前資料列標頭的寬度來計算新的高度； 則表示在預期資料列標頭的寬度也將會調整的情況下計算高度。

span.span: to calculate the new height based on the current width of the row headers; to calculate the height with the expectation that the row headers width will also be adjusted.

param.name: fixedColumnWidth
param.span: 表示根據指定資料行的目前寬度來計算新的高度； 則表示在預期資料行寬度也將會調整的情況下計算高度。

span.span: to calculate the new height based on the current width of the specified column; to calculate the height with the expectation that the column width will also be adjusted.

summary.span: 根據指定資料行中行首內容的變更來調整資料行行首的高度，並在預期接下來將調整資料行和/或資料列行首寬度的情況下，選擇性地計算高度。

span.span: Adjusts the height of the column headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified column, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that the column and/or row header widths will subsequently be adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制項時調整資料行行首的大小，如果只是要繫結的資料來源中指定的資料行的標頭的內容變更使用者編輯或變更的結果。This method is useful if you want to control when the column headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified column have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source. 資料行行首的高度會調整一次每個方法呼叫如果內容的變更需要它;如果資料行的內容標頭之後變更，資料行的標頭將不會自動調整。The height of the column headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the column headers later change, the column headers will not automatically adjust. 若要設定資料行標頭，自動調整大小及其內容變更時，使用屬性。To set the column headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 儲存格的內容時調整資料行行首的大小，分成多行換行，必須有作用中的儲存格的儲存格樣式屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 這個多載保護，而且設計成可讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生類別。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedColumnWidth`或`fixedRowHeadersWidth`參數是`false`，將這類呼叫方法預期的情況下計算資料行行首的高度和下一步。If the `fixedColumnWidth` or `fixedRowHeadersWidth` parameters are `false`, the height of the column headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the methods such as and next. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

exception.span: 不在 0 到資料行數目減 1 的有效範圍內。

span.span: is not in the valid range of 0 to the number of columns minus 1.
DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

summary.span: 調整所有資料行的寬度，以適合其儲存格的內容。

span.span: Adjusts the width of all columns to fit the contents of their cells.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AutoResizeColumns() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 調整所有資料行的寬度，以適合其所有儲存格的內容 (包括標題儲存格)。

span.span: Adjusts the width of all columns to fit the contents of all their cells, including the header cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小的資料行。This method is useful if you want to control when columns resize. 資料行寬度會一次調整每個方法呼叫;如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，資料行就不會自動調整。The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的特定資料行，請使用方法。To resize a specific column, use the method. 若要設定其內容變更時自動調整大小的資料行，請使用屬性或資料行屬性。To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property or the column property. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會調整大小以適合資料行和資料行標頭的內容的所有資料行。The following code example resizes all columns to fit the contents of the columns and the column headers. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to:以程式設計方式調整儲存格大小以符合內容中的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/CPP/programmaticsizing.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/CS/programmaticsizing.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/VB/programmaticsizing.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小的資料行。This method is useful if you want to control when columns resize. 資料行寬度會一次調整每個方法呼叫;如果更新版本的資料行的內容變更，資料行就不會自動調整。The column widths are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the columns later change, the columns will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的特定資料行，請使用方法。To resize a specific column, use the method. 若要設定其內容變更時自動調整大小的資料行，請使用屬性或資料行屬性。To set the columns to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property or the column property. 這個多載可讓您指定計算中一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列中的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new widths based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這會改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會調整大小以適合資料行和資料行標頭的內容的所有資料行。The following code example resizes all columns to fit the contents of the columns and the column headers. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to:以程式設計方式調整儲存格大小以符合內容中的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). .method familyhidebysig instance void AutoResizeRow(int32 rowIndex, valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode autoSizeRowMode, bool fixedWidth) cil managed
Protected Sub AutoResizeRow (rowIndex As Integer, autoSizeRowMode As DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode, fixedWidth As Boolean)
protected: void AutoResizeRow(int rowIndex, System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewAutoSizeRowMode autoSizeRowMode, bool fixedWidth);

param.name: rowIndex
param.span: 要調整大小之資料列的索引。

span.span: The index of the row to resize.
One of the values.

param.name: fixedWidth
param.span: 表示根據資料行的目前寬度來計算新的高度； 則表示在預期資料行寬度也將會調整的情況下計算高度。

span.span: to calculate the new height based on the current width of the columns; to calculate the height with the expectation that the column widths will also be adjusted.

summary.span: 使用指定的調整大小模式調整指定資料列的高度，並在預期接下來將調整資料行寬度的情況下，選擇性地計算高度。

span.span: Adjusts the height of the specified row using the specified size mode, optionally calculating the height with the expectation that column widths will subsequently be adjusted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制資料列調整大小時。This method is useful if you want to control when a row resizes. 每個方法呼叫，一次調整資料列高度如果更新版本的資料列的內容變更，資料列將不會自動調整。The row height is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row later change, the row will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的所有資料列，請使用方法。To resize all rows, use the method. 若要設定其內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用屬性。To set the row to automatically resize whenever its contents change, use the property. 儲存格的內容時調整大小的資料列，分成多行換行，必須有作用中的儲存格的儲存格樣式屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 這個多載可讓您指定的高度計算新的高度，根據一組有限的資料格，例如中顯示資料列中的值調整大小模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new height based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這會改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 這個多載保護，而且設計成可讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生類別。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedWidth`已`false`，資料列高度會進行計算時，多半認為您會呼叫或方法下一步。If `fixedWidth` is `false`, the row height will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the or method next. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要在資料列標頭調整大小。This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize. 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列行首的寬度如果資料列的內容標頭之後變更，資料列的標頭將不會自動調整。The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust. 若要設定資料列標頭，自動調整大小及其內容變更時，使用屬性。To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 這個方法可讓您指定計算中一組有限的標頭，例如顯示資料列中的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這會改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

summary.span: 根據指定資料列中的行首內容之變更，以及使用指定的調整大小模式來調整資料列行首的寬度。

span.span: Adjusts the width of the row headers based on changes to the contents of the header in the specified row and using the specified size mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制在資料列標頭調整大小時，如果只是要繫結的資料來源中指定的資料列的標頭的內容變更使用者編輯或變更的結果。This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize if only the contents of the header in the specified row have changed as a result of user edits or changes to a bound data source. 資料列行首的寬度會調整一次每個方法呼叫如果內容的變更需要它;如果資料列的內容標頭之後變更，資料列的標頭將不會自動調整。The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call if the content change requires it; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust. 若要設定資料列標頭，自動調整大小及其內容變更時，使用屬性。To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 這個方法可讓您指定計算中一組有限的標頭，例如顯示資料列中的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這會改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何根據變更的第一個資料列行首內容的標頭資料列寬度，調整大小。The following code example illustrates how to resize the row header widths based on changes to the contents of the first row header. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to:以程式設計方式調整儲存格大小以符合內容中的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/CPP/programmaticsizing.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/CS/programmaticsizing.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/VB/programmaticsizing.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要在資料列標頭調整大小。This method is useful if you want to control when the row headers resize. 每個方法呼叫; 一次調整資料列行首的寬度如果資料列的內容標頭之後變更，資料列的標頭將不會自動調整。The width of the row headers is adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the row headers later change, the row headers will not automatically adjust. 若要設定資料列標頭，自動調整大小及其內容變更時，使用屬性。To set the row headers to automatically resize when their contents change, use the property. 這個方法可讓您指定計算中一組有限的標頭，例如顯示資料列中的值為基礎的新寬度調整大小模式。This method lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new width based on values in a limited set of headers, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這會改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 這個多載保護，而且設計成可讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生類別。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedColumnHeadersHeight`或`fixedRowsHeight`參數是`false`，將這類呼叫方法預期的情況下計算資料列行首的寬度和下一步。If the `fixedColumnHeadersHeight` or `fixedRowsHeight` parameters are `false`, the width of the row headers will be calculated with the expectation that you will call methods such as and next. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小的資料列。This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize. 資料列高度會一次調整每個方法呼叫;如果內容的更新版本的資料列變更時，資料列將不會自動調整。The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的特定資料列，請使用方法。To resize a specific row, use the method. 若要調整大小的資料列子集，請使用多載。To resize a subset of rows, use the overload. 若要設定其內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用屬性。To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property. 儲存格的內容時調整大小的資料列，分成多行換行，必須有作用中的儲存格的儲存格樣式屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何調整非標頭資料格內容為基礎的所有資料列。The following code example demonstrates how to resize all rows based on non-header cell content. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to:以程式設計方式調整儲存格大小以符合內容中的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小的資料列。This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize. 資料列高度會一次調整每個方法呼叫;如果內容的更新版本的資料列變更時，資料列將不會自動調整。The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的特定資料列，請使用方法。To resize a specific row, use the method. 若要調整大小的資料列子集，請使用多載。To resize a subset of rows, use the overload. 若要設定其內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用屬性。To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property. 儲存格的內容時調整大小的資料列，分成多行換行，必須有作用中的儲存格的儲存格樣式屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 這個多載可讓您指定計算新的高度，在一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列中的值為基礎的調整大小模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new heights based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這會改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何調整非標頭資料格內容為基礎的所有資料列。The following code example demonstrates how to resize all rows based on non-header cell content. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to:以程式設計方式調整儲存格大小以符合內容中的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Programmatically Resize Cells to Fit Content in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/programmatically-resize-cells-to-fit-content-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/CPP/programmaticsizing.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/CS/programmaticsizing.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ProgrammaticResizing/VB/programmaticsizing.vb#7)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制何時要調整大小的資料列。This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize. 資料列高度會一次調整每個方法呼叫;如果內容的更新版本的資料列變更時，資料列將不會自動調整。The row heights are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的特定資料列，請使用方法。To resize a specific row, use the method. 若要調整大小的資料列子集，請使用多載。To resize a subset of rows, use the overload. 若要設定其內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用屬性。To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property. 儲存格的內容時調整大小的資料列，分成多行換行，必須有作用中的儲存格的儲存格樣式屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 這個多載可讓您指定計算新的高度，在一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列中的值為基礎的調整大小模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new heights based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這會改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 這個多載已受到保護，而且設計成可讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生類別。This overload is protected, and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedWidth`參數是`false`，資料列高度會進行計算時，多半認為您會呼叫或方法下一步。If the `fixedWidth` parameter is `false`, the row heights will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the or method next. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法很有用，如果您想要控制資料列的大小，但您想要調整資料列，例如在已更新的繫結資料錄的範圍內的特定子集合。This method is useful if you want to control when rows resize, but you want to resize only a specific subset of rows, such as those within a range of bound records that have been updated. 針對指定的資料列的資料列高度會一次調整每個方法呼叫;如果內容的更新版本的資料列變更時，資料列將不會自動調整。The row heights for the specified rows are adjusted only once per method call; if the contents of the rows later change, the rows will not automatically adjust. 若要調整大小的特定資料列，請使用方法。To resize a specific row, use the method. 若要調整大小的所有資料列，請使用 的不同多載方法。To resize all rows, use a different overload of the method. 若要設定其內容變更時自動調整大小的資料列，使用屬性。To set the rows to automatically resize whenever their contents change, use the property. 儲存格的內容時調整大小的資料列，分成多行換行，必須有作用中的儲存格的儲存格樣式屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 這個多載可讓您指定計算新的高度，在一組有限的資料格，例如顯示資料列中的值為基礎的調整大小模式。This overload lets you specify a sizing mode that calculates the new heights based on values in a limited set of cells, such as those in displayed rows only. 當控制項包含大量的資料列時，這會改善效能。This improves performance when the control contains a large number of rows. 這個多載保護，而且設計成可讓您達到理想的儲存格的高度與寬度比例中衍生類別。This overload is protected and is designed to enable you to achieve ideal cell height-to-width ratios in a derived class. 如果`fixedWidth`參數是`false`，資料列高度會進行計算時，多半認為您會呼叫或方法下一步。If the `fixedWidth` parameter is `false`, the row heights will be calculated with the expectation that you will call the or method next. 如需有關以程式設計方式調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about programmatic resizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您設定控制項，以便填滿控制項，或調整儲存格的內容，自動調整資料行寬度。This property lets you configure the control so that column widths are automatically adjusted either to fill the control or to fit cell contents. 每當控制項的寬度變更時調整大小就會發生在填滿模式。Size adjustments occur in fill mode whenever the width of the control changes. 在以內容為基礎的調整大小模式調整大小就會發生或儲存格內容變更時啟用時，資料列高度變更時。In content-based sizing modes, size adjustments occur whenever cell contents change or, if is enabled, whenever row heights change. 某些以內容為基礎的調整大小模式可讓您限制目前顯示的資料列的大小調整，以提升效能。Some content-based sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance. 若要變更個別資料行的調整大小模式，將其屬性。To change the sizing mode for an individual column, set its property. 這個屬性的預設值是，指出資料行繼承它的行為及其從控制項的屬性值。The default value of this property is , indicating that the column inherits its behavior and its property value from the control. 在填滿模式資料行分割中所指定的比例的可用控制項寬度其屬性值。Columns in fill mode divide the available control width in proportions indicated by their property values. 適用於填滿模式的寬度取決於減去從控制項的用戶端區域的寬度的所有資料行的寬度。The width available for fill mode is determined by subtracting the widths of all other columns from the width of the client area of the control. 如果此寬度小於結合所有填滿模式資料行的值，會顯示水平捲軸、 最小寬度，以顯示所有填滿模式資料行和使用者資料行調整已停用。If this width is smaller than the combined values of all fill-mode columns, the horizontal scroll bar is displayed, all fill-mode columns are shown with their minimum widths, and user column-resizing is disabled. 如需有關資料行填入模式的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的資料行填入模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about column fill mode, see [Column Fill Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/column-fill-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 只有包含資料行屬性值為`true`自動調整大小和變更資料行的可見性並不會導致發生調整大小。Only columns with a property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a column does not cause resizing to occur. 此外，當資料行設定為自動調整大小，使用者將無法調整資料行寬度，使用滑鼠。Additionally, when columns are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the column widths with the mouse. 若要以程式設計方式調整資料行寬度，請使用或是方法或一組資料行屬性。To adjust column widths programmatically, use the or methods or set the column property. 如需有關以內容為基礎的自動調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性在主從式案例，其中兩個控制項會顯示父子式關聯性中的兩個資料表的資料。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a master/detail scenario where two controls display data from two tables in a parent/child relationship. 在此範例中，主控制項的資料行調整大小模式是，且資料行寬度會以程式設計方式初始化為符合已載入的值。In this example, the column sizing mode for the master control is , and the column widths are programmatically initialized to fit the loaded values. 詳細資料控制項設為自動的資料行調整大小模式，以便每當值變更 （例如，當使用者變更父資料表中的目前資料列） 時，會自動調整 「 資料行。The details control is set to an automatic column sizing mode so that columns will adjust automatically whenever the values change (for example, when the user changes the current row in the parent table). 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[How to:建立使用兩個 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的主版/詳細表單](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Create a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/create-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails/CS/masterdetails.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMasterDetails/VB/masterdetails.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可讓您設定控制項，讓資料列高度會自動調整以符合其內容，每當內容變更時。This property lets you configure the control so that row heights are automatically adjusted to fit their contents whenever the contents change. 如果已啟用，資料列高度也將進行調整的資料行寬度變更時。If is enabled, row heights are also adjusted whenever column widths change. 某些調整大小模式可讓您限制目前顯示的資料列的大小調整，以提升效能。Some sizing modes let you limit the size adjustment to the currently displayed rows in order to increase performance. 只有當資料列與屬性值為`true`自動調整大小和變更資料列的可見性並不會導致發生調整大小。Only rows with a property value of `true` are resized automatically, and changing the visibility of a row does not cause resizing to occur. 此外，當資料列會設定為自動調整大小，使用者將無法調整資料列高度，以滑鼠。Additionally, when rows are set to automatically resize, the user cannot adjust the row heights with the mouse. 自動調整大小的資料列的值會重新計算期間的版面配置，會使用的字型的大小。The value of an automatically sized row is recalculated during layout to account for the size of the font that is used. 若要取得正確，您應擷取的值，在表單的而不是表單的建構函式中的事件。To get the correct , you should retrieve the value in the form's event instead of in the form's constructor. 若要以程式設計方式調整資料列高度，請使用或是方法或一組資料列屬性。To adjust row heights programmatically, use the or methods, or set the row property. 儲存格的內容時調整大小的資料列，分成多行換行，必須有作用中的儲存格的儲存格樣式屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when a row is resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 如需有關以內容為基礎的自動調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about content-based automatic sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定為自動在資料列標頭和所有資料行的內容為基礎的調整大小的資料列。The following code example demonstrates how to set the row to automatically resize based on the contents of the row headers and all of the columns. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to:自動調整儲存格內容變更 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Automatically Resize Cells When Content Changes in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/automatically-resize-cells-when-content-changes-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing/CPP/autosizing.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing/CS/autosizing.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.AutoSizing/VB/autosizing.vb#9)]

summary.span: 將目前儲存格置於編輯模式下。

span.span: Puts the current cell in edit mode.

span.span: if the current cell is already in edit mode or successfully enters edit mode; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回`false`如果儲存格，就無法進入編輯模式，這種情形的多種原因所造成。This method returns `false` if the cell fails to enter edit mode, which can happen for a number of reasons. 這個方法會傳回`false`如果目前的儲存格為唯讀。This method returns `false` if the current cell is read-only. 它也會傳回`false`如果儲存格屬性是`null`（這表示儲存格無法裝載編輯控制項） 和資料格類型未實作介面。It also returns `false` if the cell property is `null` (meaning the cell cannot host an editing control) and the cell type does not implement the interface. 如果儲存格支援編輯，這個方法會引發事件，它可以取消，並傳回`false`如果事件處理常式取消編輯。If the cell supports editing, this method raises the event, which can be canceled, and returns `false` if an event handler cancels the edit. 如果未取消編輯，而且儲存格可以裝載編輯控制項，這個方法會初始化控制項，並顯示它。If the edit is not canceled and the cell can host an editing control, this method initializes the control and displays it. 如果初始化失敗，則這個方法會傳回`false`。If the initialization fails, this method returns `false`. 如果儲存格成功進入編輯模式屬性會傳回`true`。If the cell successfully enters edit mode, the property returns `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of this method. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CancelRowEdit As QuestionEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 控制項的 屬性為 ，且取消資料列中的編輯時。

span.span: Occurs when the property of a control is and the cancels edits in a row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是在虛擬模式中，會認可變更，資料格層級的資料快取的預設值。When the is in virtual mode, changes are committed to the data cache at the cell level by default. 實作資料列層級的交易時，就可以使用事件。The event can be used when implementing row-level transactions. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件虛擬模式中的控制項。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event for a control in virtual mode. 當控制項處於編輯模式`rowInEdit`變數會保存正在編輯之資料列的索引和`customerInEdit`變數會保存對應至該資料列的客戶物件的參考。When the control is in edit mode, the `rowInEdit` variable holds the index of the row being edited, and the `customerInEdit` variable holds a reference to a Customer object corresponding to that row. 當使用者取消編輯模式時，這個物件可以被捨棄。When the user cancels out of edit mode, this object can be discarded. 如果使用者已編輯的資料列是新的記錄的資料列，不過，舊的客戶物件會捨棄而取代新，讓使用者可以重新開始進行編輯。If the row the user was editing is the row for new records, however, the old Customer object is discarded and replaced with a new one so that the user can begin making edits again. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[逐步解說：實作虛擬模式中的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Implementing Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#170](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CPP/virtualmode.cpp#170)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CS/virtualmode.cs#170)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#170](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/VB/virtualmode.vb#170)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellClick As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於按一下儲存格的任何部分時。

span.span: Occurs when any part of a cell is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按一下資料格的任何部分，包括框線和填補時，就會發生此事件。This event occurs when any part of a cell is clicked, including borders and padding. 當使用者按下並放開空格鍵，而按鈕儲存格或核取方塊儲存格有焦點，而且如果按下空格鍵，按一下資料格，會發生兩次針對這些資料格類型，它也會發生。It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACE key while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell is clicked while pressing the SPACE key. 若要判斷按一下儲存格內容時，處理事件。To determine when the cell contents are clicked, handle the event. 此事件沒有收到滑鼠位置的相關資訊。This event does not receive information about the mouse position. 如果事件處理常式需要滑鼠位置的相關資訊，請使用事件。If the event handler needs information about the mouse position, use the event. 在中按一下之前的核取方塊變更值，因此如果您不想要計算預期的值根據目前的值，就會發生此事件，您通常會處理事件改。For clicks in a , this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the event instead. 因為該事件發生於只有使用者指定的值在認可時，這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格，您也必須處理事件。Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the event. 在該處理常式中，如果目前的儲存格是資料的核取方塊儲存格，呼叫方法並傳入值。In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例所示Tic-Tac-Toe 遊戲的實作會使用映像中的資料行中的事件處理常式控制項。The following code example shows a event handler in a Tic-Tac-Toe game implementation that uses image columns in a control. 除非遊戲便會結束，或已按下儲存格的事件處理常式會將儲存格的值設定為有兩個變數所代表的物件`x`和`o`。Unless the game is over or the cell has already been clicked, the event handler sets the cell value to one of two objects represented by the variables `x` and `o`. 此程式碼屬於較大的範例所示的[How to:使用 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的影像資料行](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This code is part of a larger example shown in [How to: Work with Image Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-work-with-image-columns-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CPP/tictactoe.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/CS/tictactoe.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ImageColumn_TicTacToe/VB/tictactoe.vb#10)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellContentClick As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 按一下儲存格內的內容時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the content within a cell is clicked.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按一下儲存格內容時，就會發生此事件。This event occurs when the cell content is clicked. 當使用者按下並放開空格鍵按鈕儲存格時，或核取方塊儲存格有焦點，而且如果按下空格鍵，按一下儲存格內容，會發生兩次針對這些資料格類型時，它也會發生。It also occurs when the user presses and releases the SPACEBAR while a button cell or check box cell has focus, and will occur twice for these cell types if the cell content is clicked while pressing the SPACEBAR. 使用這個事件來偵測按鈕點擊或按一下 連結。Use this event to detect button clicks for a or link clicks for a . 在中按一下之前的核取方塊變更值，因此如果您不想要計算預期的值根據目前的值，就會發生此事件，您通常會處理事件改。For clicks in a , this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the event instead. 因為該事件發生於只有使用者指定的值在認可時，這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格，您也必須處理事件。Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the event. 在該處理常式中，如果目前的儲存格是資料的核取方塊儲存格，呼叫方法並傳入值。In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會判斷是否已按下 儲存格的連結資料格，或按鈕儲存格，並執行對應的動作，如此一來此事件提供的處理常式。The following code example provides a handler for this event that determines whether the clicked cell is a link cell or a button cell and performs the corresponding action as a result. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#60](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#60)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#60](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#60)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#60](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#60)]

[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#286](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#286)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#286](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#286)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

summary.span: 發生於需要儲存格的捷徑功能表時。

span.span: Occurs when a cell's shortcut menu is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 才會發生事件時控制屬性設定或其屬性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 當您處理您指定的處理常式中的捷徑功能表會顯示事件，每當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵的資料格。When you handle the event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a cell. 當您想要顯示的捷徑功能表，取決於目前的狀態或儲存格的值，這非常有用。This is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by the current state or value of a cell. 也就會發生事件時的值已擷取屬性，或是以程式設計的方式，或當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵的資料格。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a cell. 您可以使用並屬性來判斷狀態或儲存格，並使用此資訊來變更或修改屬性。You can use the and properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 這個屬性會使用儲存格的值初始化屬性，它會覆寫的事件值。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 處理事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定儲存格多個資料格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 您也可以指定快顯功能表，針對個別資料列，而不是個別資料格，藉由設定資料列屬性或處理事件。You can also specify shortcut menus for individual rows rather than individual cells by setting the row property or handling the event. 儲存格屬性設定會覆寫的資料列屬性設定值，而事件覆寫這兩事件和資料列屬性設定。The cell property setting overrides the row property setting, and the event overrides both the event and the row property setting. 不過，您可以指定`null`的儲存格的捷徑功能表，以防止遭到覆寫的資料列的捷徑功能表。However, you can specify `null` for a cell shortcut menu to prevent a row shortcut menu from being overridden. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件處理常式，以顯示當使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下資料格時，使用自訂的捷徑功能表。The following code example demonstrates how to use a event handler to display a custom shortcut menu used when the user right-clicks a cell. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CPP/sharedrows.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CS/sharedrows.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/VB/sharedrows.vb#20)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellDoubleClick As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 使用者按兩下儲存格中的任何位置時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks anywhere in a cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellEndEdit As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 目前所選取儲存格的編輯模式停止時發生。

span.span: Occurs when edit mode stops for the currently selected cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來清除資料列屬性在先前設定的情況下事件處理常式。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to clear the row property in case it was previously set by a event handler. 事件處理常式可以清除錯誤文字，而當按下 ESC，使用者會還原為舊資料格的值時新儲存格的值符合驗證準則，事件不會發生。The event handler can clear the error text when the new cell value meets the validation criteria, but when the user reverts to the old cell value by pressing ESC, the event does not occur. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[逐步解說：驗證資料，在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-validating-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Validating Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/walkthrough-validating-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation/CS/datavalidation.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataValidation/VB/datavalidation.vb#20)]

summary.span: 發生於 控制項中的目前儲存格變更時，或是當控制項收到輸入焦點時。

span.span: Occurs when the current cell changes in the control or when the control receives input focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控制項沒有輸入的焦點且按下的儲存格之前不是目前的儲存格，此事件可能會發生兩次的按一下。This event may occur twice for a single click if the control does not have input focus and the clicked cell was not previously the current cell. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來變更目前儲存格的屬性。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the current cell. 在此範例設定的選取項目背景色彩事件，然後重設上事件。In this example the selection background color is set in the event, then reset to on the event. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的表單名為`dataGridView1`，並確保其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#190](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#190)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#190](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#190)]
