[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#291](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#291)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#291](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#291)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

summary.span: 需要儲存格的錯誤文字時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell's error text is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 才會發生事件時控制屬性設定或其屬性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 處理事件很有用，當您想要判斷其值或狀態而定的資料格的錯誤。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a cell depending on its value or state. 當您處理事件，並指定錯誤文字中的處理常式中，錯誤圖像顯示在儲存格中除非屬性設定為`false`或儲存格處於編輯模式。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the cell unless the property is set to `false` or the cell is in edit mode. 當使用者將滑鼠指標移錯誤圖像 （glyph） 時，錯誤文字會出現在工具提示中。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 也就會發生事件時的值已擷取屬性。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 您可以使用並屬性來判斷狀態或儲存格，並使用此資訊來變更或修改屬性。You can use the and property to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 這個屬性會使用儲存格的值初始化屬性，它會覆寫的事件值。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 處理事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定儲存格多個資料格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立儲存格的錯誤訊息，而不會取消共用資料列，或造成被複製到所有共用的儲存格的資料格錯誤。The following code example demonstrates how to create error messages for cells without unsharing rows or causing the cell error to be duplicated over all the shared cells. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CPP/sharedrows.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/CS/sharedrows.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_SharedRowScenarios/VB/sharedrows.vb#20)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellFormatting As DataGridViewCellFormattingEventHandler

summary.span: 需設定要顯示之儲存格內容的格式時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the contents of a cell need to be formatted for display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，控制項將會嘗試將儲存格的值轉換成適合顯示格式。By default, the control will attempt to convert a cell's value into a format suitable for display. 比方說，它會將數值轉換為文字 方塊儲存格中顯示字串。For example, it will convert a numerical value into a string for display in a text box cell. 您可以指出要藉由設定使用的格式化慣例的屬性屬性所傳回的這類屬性。You can indicate the formatting convention to use by setting the property of the returned by properties such as the property. 如果您沒有足夠的標準格式，您可以自訂格式處理事件。If the standard formatting is insufficient, you can customize the formatting by handling the event. 此事件可讓您指出確切的顯示值，以及儲存格樣式，例如背景和前景色彩，若要使用的儲存格顯示。This event lets you indicate the exact display value as well as the cell styles, such as background and foreground color, to use for the cell display. 這表示您可以處理任何種類的儲存格的格式，不論是否儲存格的值本身需要格式化的這個事件。This means you can handle this event for any kind of cell formatting, regardless of whether the cell value itself needs formatting. 每一次，每個儲存格繪製，因此您應該避免長時間處理時處理這個事件，就會發生事件。The event occurs every time each cell is painted, so you should avoid lengthy processing when handling this event. 也會發生此事件時的儲存格擷取或其呼叫方法。This event also occurs when the cell is retrieved or its method is called. 當您處理事件，屬性會初始化與儲存格的值。When you handle the event, the property is initialized with the cell value. 如果您提供從儲存格的值來顯示值的自訂轉換，將屬性設為已轉換的值，確保新的值儲存格所指定之型別的屬性。If you provide custom conversion from the cell value to the display value, set the property to the converted value, ensuring that the new value is of the type specified by the cell property. 若要指出任何進一步的值，格式為必要，請設定屬性設`true`。To indicate that no further value formatting is necessary, set the property to `true`. 事件處理常式完成時，如果是`null`或者不是正確的類型，或有屬性是`false`，則使用格式化， ， ，和屬性所傳回的儲存格樣式屬性，使用儲存格初始化屬性。When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is formatted using the , , , and properties of the cell style returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 值為何屬性中，所傳回之物件的顯示屬性屬性用來呈現儲存格。Regardless of the value of the property, the display properties of the object returned by the property are used to render the cell. 如需自訂格式化使用的詳細資訊事件，請參閱[How to:自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料格式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about custom formatting using the event, see [How to: Customize Data Formatting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-data-formatting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要避免效能的負面影響，處理這個事件時，存取透過事件處理常式，而不是直接存取的資料格參數的儲存格。To avoid performance penalties when handling this event, access the cell through the parameters of the event handler rather than accessing the cell directly. 若要自訂格式化、 使用者指定的值轉換成實際的資料格的值，處理事件。To customize the conversion of a formatted, user-specified value into an actual cell value, handle the event. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件。The following code example shows how to handle the event. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellMouseClick As DataGridViewCellMouseEventHandler

summary.span: 每當使用者以滑鼠按一下儲存格上的任何地方時發生。

span.span: Occurs whenever the user clicks anywhere on a cell with the mouse.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按一下 使用任何滑鼠按鈕時，就會發生此事件。This event occurs when the user clicks using any of the mouse buttons. 使用屬性來判斷所按的按鈕。Use the property to determine which button was clicked. 若要偵測點選的資料格，例如按鈕或連結的資料格內的內容使用事件。To detect clicks on the contents of a cell, such as a button or link within a cell, use the event. 這個事件處理常式會接收的資料行索引和資料列的滑鼠指標位置的索引。The handler for this event receives the column index and row index of the mouse pointer position. 在中按一下之前的核取方塊變更值，因此如果您不想要計算預期的值根據目前的值，就會發生此事件，您通常會處理事件改。For clicks in a , this event occurs before the check box changes value, so if you do not want to calculate the expected value based on the current value, you will typically handle the event instead. 因為該事件發生於只有使用者指定的值在認可時，這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格，您也必須處理事件。Because that event occurs only when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell, you must also handle the event. 在該處理常式中，如果目前的儲存格是資料的核取方塊儲存格，呼叫方法並傳入值。In that handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#295](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#295)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#295](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#295)]

span.span: Occurs when the user presses a mouse button while the mouse pointer is within the boundaries of a cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當使用者按下任何滑鼠按鈕時，就會發生此事件。This event occurs when the user presses any of the mouse buttons. 使用屬性來判斷所按的按鈕。Use the property to determine which button was clicked. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellPainting As DataGridViewCellPaintingEventHandler

summary.span: 需要繪製儲存格時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell needs to be drawn.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以處理這個事件，以自訂控制項中的儲存格的外觀。You can handle this event to customize the appearance of cells in the control. 您可以繪製整個儲存格，或 [小畫家] 的資料格的特定部分，並使用或繪製其他組件的方法。You can paint entire cells yourself, or paint specific parts of cells and use the or methods to paint other parts. 您也可以使用繪製使用目前的佈景主題的標準控制項的類別。You can also use the class to paint standard controls using the current theme. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 呈現具有視覺化樣式的控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). 如果您使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，您也可以存取您可以搭配使用的標準映像的大型程式庫來控制項。If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the control. 當處理這個事件，您應該透過事件處理常式的參數來存取該儲存格，而不是直接存取的資料格。When handling this event, you should access the cell through the parameters of the event handler, rather than access the cell directly. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用此事件來自訂特定的資料行中的所有儲存格的外觀。The following code example illustrates how to use this event to customize the appearance of all cells in a particular column. 此程式碼是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to:自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格的外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Cells in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-cells-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellPainting/VB/form1.vb#10)]

related.span: 如何：在 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中自訂儲存格的外觀

span.span: How to: Customize the Appearance of Cells in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control
DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellParsing As DataGridViewCellParsingEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於已經修改儲存格值後，該儲存格離開編輯模式時。

span.span: Occurs when a cell leaves edit mode if the cell value has been modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，控制項將會嘗試將使用者指定的值，顯示在儲存格所指定的型別中的實際基礎儲存格中值的儲存格屬性。By default, the control will attempt to convert a user-specified value displayed in a cell to an actual underlying cell value in the type specified by the cell property. 這項轉換會使用格式內容的儲存格所傳回的儲存格樣式屬性。This conversion uses the formatting properties of the cell style returned by the cell property. 如果標準轉換不符合您的需求，處理事件，以提供自訂的值轉換為要求的類型。If the standard conversion does not meet your needs, handle the event to provide custom value conversion to the required type. 使用者可以輸入編輯模式中使用指定的方法屬性，並可以離開編輯模式中，移至另一個資料格，或按下 ENTER 鍵，儲存格，認可任何變更。Users can enter edit mode using the method specified by the property, and can leave edit mode, committing any changes to a cell, by moving to another cell or by pressing ENTER. 按下 esc 鍵將會還原為值的任何變更之前認可，而事件不會發生。Pressing ESC will revert any changes to the value before it is committed, and the event will not occur. 事件才會發生實際已修改資料格的值，即使最終的值會是原始的值相同。The event occurs only if the cell value has actually been modified, even if the final value is the same as the original value. 它也會發生時呼叫方法。It also occurs when the method is called. 當您處理事件，您可以自行轉換值，或者您可以自訂預設轉換。When you handle the event, you can convert the value yourself or you can customize the default conversion. 比方說，您可以將值轉換使用的儲存格自行使用類型轉換器，您所選擇的方法。For example, you can convert the value yourself using the cell method with type converters of your choosing. 或者，您可以讓預設的類型轉換器剖析的值，但修改， ，並屬性所傳回的物件屬性，使用儲存格初始化屬性。Alternatively, you can let the default type converters parse the value, but modify the , , and properties of the object returned by the property, which is initialized using the cell property. 當您自行轉換值時，將初始的格式化值取代屬性中儲存格所指定之類型的轉換值屬性。When you convert the value yourself, replace the initial, formatted value of the property with the converted value in the type specified by the cell property. 若要指出任何進一步剖析是必要，設定屬性設`true`。To indicate that no further parsing is necessary, set the property to `true`. 事件處理常式完成時，如果是`null`或者不是正確的類型，或屬性是`false`，則剖析使用的儲存格與預設型別轉換子的方法。When the event handler completes, if the is `null` or is not of the correct type, or the property is `false`, the is parsed using the cell method with default type converters. 這個方法的預設實作會剖析值使用， ，和中傳遞的儲存格樣式屬性。The default implementation of this method parses the value using the , , and properties of the cell style passed in. 如果值不等於，該值剖析使用中傳遞的屬性和型別轉換子。If the value is not equal to , the value is parsed using the property and the type converters passed in. 若要自訂的資料格的值轉換成數值顯示的格式化值，處理事件。To customize the conversion of a cell value into a formatted value for display, handle the event. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件。The following code example shows how to handle the event. 它也會示範如何使用類別。It also shows how to use the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性值時，就會發生事件其中一個下列的屬性變更所傳回的物件：The event occurs when a property value of a object returned by one of the following properties changes: - - - - - - - - 如果其中一個屬性設定為不同，不過相對應*PropertyName* `Changed`就會發生事件，但事件不會發生。If one of these properties is set to a different , however, the corresponding *PropertyName*`Changed` event occurs, but the event does not occur. 資料列、 資料行和資料格屬性的名稱*PropertyName* `Changed`事件開頭 」`Row`"，"`Column`"，或 「`Cell`」 (比方說， )。For row, column, and cell properties, the name of the *PropertyName*`Changed` event begins with "`Row`", "`Column`", or "`Cell`" (for example, ). 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 發生於 中儲存格的 屬性值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the property value changes for a cell in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#307](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#307)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#307](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#307)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

summary.span: 需要儲存格的工具提示文字時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a cell's ToolTip text is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 才會發生事件時控制屬性設定或其屬性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 當您處理事件，您指定的處理常式中的工具提示文字會顯示每當滑鼠指標位在儲存格和控制項屬性值是`true`。When you handle the event, the ToolTip text you specify in the handler is shown whenever the mouse pointer is over a cell and the control property value is `true`. 事件很有用，當您想要顯示的目前狀態或儲存格的值所決定的工具提示。The event is useful when you want to display ToolTips determined by the current state or value of a cell. 也就會發生事件時的值已擷取屬性，或是以程式設計的方式，或當滑鼠指標進入儲存格。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the mouse pointer enters a cell. 您可以使用並屬性來判斷狀態或儲存格，並使用此資訊來變更或修改屬性。You can use the and properties to determine the state or value of a cell, and use this information to change or modify the property. 這個屬性會使用儲存格的值初始化屬性，它會覆寫的事件值。This property is initialized with the value of the cell property, which the event value overrides. 處理事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定儲存格多個資料格的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the cell value for multiple cells. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件處理常式，以顯示資料繫結中隱藏資料行的資訊控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use a event handler to display information from hidden columns in a data-bound control. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/CS/Form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/VB/Form1.vb#20)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellValidated As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 儲存格完成驗證之後發生。

span.span: Occurs after the cell has finished validating.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 處理此事件可用於驗證後置處理的儲存格的值就行了。Handling this event is useful for post-validation processing of the cell value. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件，以清除屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to clear out the property. 在此範例中，事件如果使用者輸入無效，無法在資料格中的資料。In this example, the event sets the if the user enters data that is not valid into a cell. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/CS/form1.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/VB/form1.vb#50)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellValidating As DataGridViewCellValidatingEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於儲存格失去輸入焦點、啟用內容驗證時。

span.span: Occurs when a cell loses input focus, enabling content validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取消這個事件會取消目前儲存格的變更。Canceling this event cancels the changes to the current cell. 當資料繫結模式取消這個事件時，新的值不會推送至基礎資料來源。When this event is canceled in data-bound mode, the new value is not pushed to the underlying data source. 此事件會在虛擬模式中，在取消時不會引發事件。When this event is canceled in virtual mode, the event will not be raised. 處理事件來執行驗證後置處理。Handle the event to perform post-validation processing. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件以確保使用者所輸入的只是正整數。The following code example handles the event to ensure that only positive integers are entered by the user. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#40)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#40)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#40](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#40)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellValueChanged As DataGridViewCellEventHandler

summary.span: 儲存格的值變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of a cell changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 認可，使用者指定的值時，就會發生事件這通常發生於焦點離開儲存格。The event occurs when the user-specified value is committed, which typically occurs when focus leaves the cell. 如果核取方塊儲存格，不過，您通常要立即處理變更。In the case of check box cells, however, you will typically want to handle the change immediately. 若要認可變更，按一下儲存格時，您必須處理事件。To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the event. 在處理常式中，核取方塊儲存格的目前儲存格時，呼叫方法並傳入值。In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the method and pass in the value. 資料格的值變更時，不會自動排序控制項中的資料列。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when a cell value is changed. 若要排序控制項，當使用者修改資料格時，請呼叫方法中的事件處理常式。To sort the control when the user modifies a cell, call the method in a event handler. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件，以平衡資料行的值更新。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to update the values in a balance column of a . 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/CS/form1.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/VB/form1.vb#30)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event CellValueNeeded As DataGridViewCellValueEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於 控制項的 屬性為 ，且 需要有儲存格的值，才能格式化並顯示此儲存格時。

span.span: Occurs when the property of the control is and the requires a value for a cell in order to format and display the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在虛擬模式中使用這個事件，來填入資料格的自訂資料存放區中的資料，而不會造成變成非共用的資料列。Use this event in virtual mode to populate cells with data from a custom data store without causing rows to become unshared. 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需有關虛擬模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 若要加入您的自訂資料存放區中的使用者指定的值，請處理事件。To add user-specified values to your custom data store, handle the event. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件，以填入資料格具有正數的整數。The following code example handles the event to populate cells with positive integers. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#10)]

span.span: Occurs when the property of the control is and a cell value has changed and requires storage in the underlying data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用者指定的資料更新的自訂資料存放區，在虛擬模式中使用這個事件。Use this event in virtual mode to update a custom data store with user-specified data. 處理事件來擷取顯示在控制項中的資料存放區中的值。Handle the event to retrieve values from the data store for display in the control. 如需有關虛擬模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的虛擬模式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about virtual mode, see [Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理更新和新的項目儲存在資料存放區物件的事件。The following code example handles the event to store updates and new entries in a data store object. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#10)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#10)]

summary.span: 取消選取目前已選取的儲存格。

span.span: Cancels the selection of currently selected cells.

summary.span: 取消選取所有選取的儲存格來清除目前的選取範圍。

span.span: Clears the current selection by unselecting all selected cells.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫此方法時，每個資料行和資料列的屬性設定為`false`。When this method is called, each column and row's property is set to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會同時清除選取。The following code example clears the selection of the . 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的表單名為`dataGridView1`並名為`clearSelectionButton`，並確保其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and a named `clearSelectionButton`, and ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#170](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#170)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#170](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#170)]

.method familyhidebysig instance void ClearSelection(int32 columnIndexException, int32 rowIndexException, bool selectExceptionElement) cil managed
Protected Sub ClearSelection (columnIndexException As Integer, rowIndexException As Integer, selectExceptionElement As Boolean)
protected: void ClearSelection(int columnIndexException, int rowIndexException, bool selectExceptionElement);
member this.ClearSelection : int * int * bool -> unit

span.span: The column index to exclude.
The row index to exclude.

param.name: selectExceptionElement
param.span: 表示選取被排除的儲存格、資料列或資料行， 則表示保留其原始狀態。

span.span: to select the excluded cell, row, or column; to retain its original state.

summary.span: 取消選取目前已選取的所有儲存格 (除了指示的儲存格以外)，並選擇性地確定所指示的儲存格已選取。

span.span: Cancels the selection of all currently selected cells except the one indicated, optionally ensuring that the indicated cell is selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A`rowIndexException`值為-1 表示資料行標頭和`columnIndexException`值為-1 表示資料列標頭。A `rowIndexException` value of -1 represents a column header, and a `columnIndexException` value of -1 represents a row header. 此方法相當實用，清除目前的選取範圍，而無需取消選取的資料格、 資料列或例外狀況的索引所指示的資料行。This method is useful to clear the current selection without canceling the selection of the cell, row, or column indicated by the exception indexes. 如果屬性值可讓個別的儲存格選取範圍，這個方法會設定屬性的每個資料格`false`，但不包括中的資料列和資料行所指定的儲存格。If the property value allows individual cell selection, this method sets the property of each cell to `false`, excluding the cell in the row and column specified. 如果屬性值可讓完整的資料列或資料行選取項目，這個方法也集每個資料列或資料行的屬性`false`，不包括資料列或資料行，內含指定的儲存格。If the property value allows full row or column selection, this method also sets the property of each row or column to `false`, excluding the row or column containing the specified cell. 排除的儲存格、 資料列或資料行可能會或可能無法在選取狀態時呼叫這個方法。The excluded cell, row, or column may or may not be in the selected state when this method is called. 這個方法會選取它若`selectExceptionElement`參數值是`true`。This method selects it if the `selectExceptionElement` parameter value is `true`. 根據選取模式，整個資料列或資料行也可以選取結果。Depending on the selection mode, the entire row or column may also be selected as a result.

exception.span: 大於最高的資料行索引。

span.span: is greater than the highest column index.
-or-

exception.span: 當 為 時， 小於 -1；否則 小於 0。

-or-

DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode ClipboardCopyMode { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewClipboardCopyMode value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出使用者是否可以將儲存格文字值複製到 ，以及是否會包含資料列和資料行標頭文字。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether users can copy cell text values to the and whether row and column header text is included.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項複製到剪貼簿的每個選取的儲存格的文字表示。The control copies the text representation of each selected cell to the Clipboard. 這個值是儲存格的值轉換成字串或影像資料格，值屬性。This value is the cell value converted to a string or, for image cells, the value of the property. 值會複製到剪貼簿， ， ，和格式。Values are copied to the Clipboard in , , , and formats. 這些格式可用於將內容貼到記事本，Microsoft Excel 之類的應用程式和[!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/includes/ofprword-md.md)]。These formats are useful for pasting content into applications such as Notepad, Microsoft Excel, and [!INCLUDE[ofprword](~/includes/ofprword-md.md)]. 控制項複製中包括所有選取的資料格的最小矩形所包含的資料格。The control copies the cells contained in the smallest rectangle that includes all selected cells. 資料列和資料行不包含任何選取的儲存格不會出現在複製的資料中。Rows and columns that do not contain any selected cells are not represented in the copied data. 其餘的資料列和資料行中任何未選取資料格會以空白預留位置表示。Any unselected cells in the remaining rows and columns are represented by blank placeholders. 根據複製模式和選取模式，複製的資料列和資料行的標頭值可能是，一併複製。Depending on the copy mode and the selection mode, header values for the copied rows and columns may be copied, as well. 當使用者複製內容，控制項會新增到剪貼簿。When users copy content, the control adds a to the Clipboard. 這個資料物件擷取自方法。This data object is retrieved from the method. 當您想要以程式設計方式在剪貼簿中加入資料物件時，您可以呼叫這個方法。You can call this method when you want to programmatically add the data object to the Clipboard. 方法會擷取個別資料格的值，藉由呼叫方法。The method retrieves values for individual cells by calling the method. 您可以覆寫一個或兩個自訂複製的儲存格的版面配置，或以支援其他資料格式的衍生類別中的這些方法。You can override either or both of these methods in derived classes to customize the layout of copied cells or to support additional data formats. 如需剪貼簿作業和資料格式的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about Clipboard operations and data formats, see the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何啟用複製控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to enable copying in the control. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[How to:讓使用者將多個儲存格複製到剪貼簿中，從 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo/CS/datagridviewclipboarddemo.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewClipboardDemo/VB/datagridviewclipboarddemo.vb#10)]

exception.span: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值不是有效的 值。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property is not a valid value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定屬性設為 0 將會移除所有的資料行從。Setting the property to 0 will remove all columns from the . 如果重設的值小於目前的值，就移除資料行從結尾集合。If is reset to a value less than the current value, columns will be removed from the end of the collection. 如果設定設為大於目前的值的值，將資料行加入至結尾集合。If is set to a value greater than the current value, columns will be added to the end of the collection. 這個屬性可以搭配屬性來建立簡單來顯示和編輯文字。This property can be used with the property to create a simple for displaying and editing text. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，以及屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , , , , , , , , and properties. 此外，在程式碼範例示範如何設定和屬性。In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的表單名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 請確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. summary.span: 使用者按兩下兩個資料行之間的分割線時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks a divider between two columns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個事件自訂發生於使用者按兩下資料行分割線的自動調整大小行為。You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a column divider. 比方說，您可以處理這個事件來以程式設計方式調整大小只以目前可見的資料列中的內容為基礎的資料行時使用大量的資料列，避免發生預設行為對效能產生影響。For example, you can handle this event to programmatically resize columns based only on the content in the rows that are currently visible, avoiding a performance impact with the default behavior when working with a large number of rows. 資料行屬性不會擴充的區域，使用者可以連按兩下。The column property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click. 如果已經透過這個屬性使用增加的分割線的寬度，當使用者按兩下分割線與相鄰的資料行之間的界限時，就會發生此事件。If the width of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. summary.span: 使用者按一下資料行行首時發生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 在中按一下資料行標題時，預設行為是根據所按的資料行，為格線資料列排序，或反轉排序次序，如果已按下 資料行的已排序方格。When a column heading is clicked in a , the default behavior is to order the grid rows based on the clicked column, or to reverse the sort order if the grid is already sorted by the clicked column. 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個事件來執行模擬按一下的預設行為以程式設計方式排序時已停用的預設行為。The following code example demonstrates how to use this event to perform a programmatic sort that emulates the default behavior of clicking a when the default behavior has been disabled. 在此範例中，設定為，因此按一下選取資料行的內容。In this example, the is set to , so clicking the selects the contents of the column. 以如預期般運作的範例程式碼，預設資料行標頭按一下 變更資料載入至每個階段的行為需求。For the example code to function as intended, the default column header click behavior needs to be changed each time the data is loaded into the . 新增提供變更的預設行為的程式碼的事件處理常式。Add a event handler to provide the code that changes the default behavior. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的表單名為`dataGridView1`，並確保其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. summary.span: 取得資料行行首所套用的框線樣式。

span.span: Gets the border style applied to the column headers.
One of the values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果以外的其他屬性設定為，則屬性必須是系統色彩。If the property is set to anything other than , the property must be a system color. 您無法將此屬性設定為值，這唯讀的值，表示，已使用自訂的框線樣式屬性。You cannot set this property to the value, which is a read-only value indicating that the border style has been customized through the use of the property. > [!NOTE] > 如果啟用視覺化樣式的應用程式，透過方法和屬性是`true`，資料行標頭來塗繪，使用目前的佈景主題。If visual styles are enabled for the application through the method and the property is `true`, the column headers are painted using the current theme. 在此案例中的值以外的所有資料行標頭，則會都忽略屬性，未套用的佈景主題。In this case, the value of the property is ignored for all column headers except the , to which the theme is not applied. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，以及屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , , , , , , , , and properties. 此外，在程式碼範例示範如何設定和屬性。In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的表單名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named`dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 請確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值傳回由這個屬性具有下列的初始屬性值：The default returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` 屬性`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|預設值Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| ||| ||| 這些值會自動覆寫透過設定的值屬性。These values automatically override the values set through the property. 若要強制繼承的資料行標頭值，您必須設定的值設為預設值的物件指定類別。To force column headers to inherit the values, you must set the values in the object to the default values indicated for the class. 如需有關儲存格樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如果啟用視覺化樣式和設定為`true`，以外的所有標頭資料格會使用目前的佈景主題來繪製和值會被忽略。If visual styles are enabled and is set to `true`, all header cells except the are painted using the current theme and the values are ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，以及屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to set the , , , , , , , , , and properties. 此外，在程式碼範例示範如何設定和屬性。In addition, the code example demonstrates how to set the and properties. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的表單名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 請確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出資料行標頭的高度是否可以調整，以及使用者是否可以調整此高度，或是會配合標頭內容，自動調整此高度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the height of the column headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.

value.span: 值，指出資料行標頭資料列的高度可以根據哪一個模式來調整。

span.span: A value indicating the mode by which the height of the column headers row can be adjusted.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為，無法由使用者調整資料行行首的高度。When this property is set to , the height of the column headers cannot be adjusted by the user. 若要以程式設計方式調整資料行行首的高度，請使用方法或一組屬性。To adjust the height of the column headers programmatically, use the method or set the property. 若要設定資料列標頭調整大小模式，使用屬性。To set the sizing mode for the row headers, use the property. 儲存格的內容時調整資料行行首的大小，分成多行換行，必須有作用中的儲存格的儲存格樣式屬性值為。For cell contents to wrap onto multiple lines when the column headers are resized, the cell style in effect for the cell must have a property value of . 如需標頭調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控制項不支援雙重緩衝。The control does not support double buffering. 如果設定為`true`中衍生控制項，在調整大小時，資料列、 資料行或標頭，或重新排序資料行時，使用者不會接收視覺化回饋。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性在主要用於顯示的控制項。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，以數種方式自訂控制項的視覺外觀，控制項設定了有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. summary.span: 讓資料快取認可目前儲存格中的變更，而不需要結束編輯模式。

returns.span: 如果已認可變更，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the changes were committed; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會嘗試將格式化的使用者指定值轉換為基礎的資料格資料型別。This method attempts to convert the formatted, user-specified value to the underlying cell data type. 若要這樣做，便會產生事件，您可以處理自訂型別轉換。To do this, it raises the event, which you can handle to customize the type conversion. 否則，會使用預設型別轉換子。Otherwise, default type converters are used. 轉換錯誤可能會導致例外狀況如果未以防止它處理事件。Conversion errors may result in an exception if the event is not handled to prevent it. 如果成功轉換的值，它會認可至資料存放區，引發非資料繫結的事件資料格時屬性值是`true`。If the value is successfully converted, it is committed to the data store, raising the event for non-data-bound cells when the property value is `true`. 如果值為成功認可，就會發生事件。If the value is successfully committed, the event occurs. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會呼叫方法內引發的事件處理常式事件。The following code example calls the method within a event handler to raise the event. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to:停用按鈕，按鈕資料行中的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md). summary.span: 取得或設定目前的現用儲存格。

span.span: Gets or sets the currently active cell.

value.span: ，表示目前的儲存格；如果沒有目前的儲存格，則為 。

span.span: The that represents the current cell, or if there is no current cell.

value.span: 預設為第一個資料行中的第一個儲存格，如果控制項中沒有任何儲存格，則為 。

span.span: The default is the first cell in the first column or if there are no cells in the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將資料格設定為目前的儲存格時，它會捲動到檢視如果目前沒有顯示。When you set a cell as the current cell, it will scroll into view if it is not currently displayed. 目前的儲存格不能標頭資料格、 已停用資料格，隱藏的資料列或資料行中。The current cell cannot be a header cell, a disabled cell, or a cell in a hidden row or column. 您可以將此屬性設定為`null`暫時移除焦點矩形，但當控制項取得焦點且這個屬性的值為`null`，它會自動設定的值為屬性。You can set this property to `null` to temporarily remove the focus rectangle, but when the control receives focus and the value of this property is `null`, it is automatically set to the value of the property. 當您變更此屬性的值事件發生之前事件。When you change the value of this property, the event occurs before the event. 任何事件處理常式存取屬性此時會取得先前的值。Any event handler accessing the property at this time will get its previous value. 當您繫結至外部資料來源，這個屬性會重設為其預設值。When you bind the to an external data source, this property is reset to its default value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何確保目前的儲存格為可見，藉由設定排序後至儲存格的屬性，透過擷取屬性。The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting by setting the property to the cell retrieved through the property. 此程式碼僅適用於未繫結控制項。This code works only with an unbound control. 使用控制項繫結至外部資料來源，目前儲存格不會自動保存排序時。With a control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為`dataGridView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`. 在 C# 中，您也必須連接事件處理常式的事件。In C#, you must also connect the event to the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#150)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#150)]

summary.span: 取得目前的現用儲存格的資料列和資料行的索引。

span.span: Gets the row and column indexes of the currently active cell.

value.span: ，表示目前作用中之儲存格的資料列和資料行索引。

span.span: A that represents the row and column indexes of the currently active cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個屬性來判斷資料列和資料行的目前儲存格，而不需要直接存取的資料格。Use this property to determine the row and column of the current cell without accessing the cell directly. 此方法以避免資料列取消共用。This is useful to avoid unsharing shared rows. 如需有關共用資料列的詳細資訊，請參閱[縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about row sharing, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用在資料列繪製的案例中的屬性。The following code example illustrates how to use the property in a row-painting scenario. 在範例中，這個屬性用來儲存目前的儲存格的資料列索引。In the example, this property is used to store the row index of the current cell. 當使用者變更目前的儲存格，以不同的資料列時，資料列會強制重新繪製本身。When the user changes the current cell to a different row, the row is forced to repaint itself. 此程式碼是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to:自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列的外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#19)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#19](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#19)]

summary.span: 當儲存格狀態變更是與儲存格內容變更有關時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the state of a cell changes in relation to a change in its contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 標示為修改其內容已變更，但變更尚未儲存的資料格。A cell is marked as modified if its contents have changed but the change has not been saved. 當儲存格已經過編輯，但變更尚未認可至資料快取或取消編輯作業時，通常就會發生此事件。This event typically occurs when a cell has been edited but the change has not been committed to the data cache, or when an edit operation is canceled. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理事件。The following code example demonstrates how to handle the event. 在此範例中，事件處理常式會呼叫方法以引發事件，並判斷目前的值。In this example, the event handler calls the method to raise the event and determine the current value of a . 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to:停用按鈕，按鈕資料行中的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisabledButtons#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisabledButtons/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisabledButtons#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DisabledButtons/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要變更目前的資料列，您必須設定所需的資料列中的資料格的屬性。To change the current row, you must set the property to a cell in the desired row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 或資料的內容來源變更時，會引發這個事件的值， ，或屬性變更。This event is raised when the contents of the data source change or when the value of the , , or property changes. 處理此事件會很有用，比方說，若要以程式設計方式調整大小的資料列和內容更新為基礎的資料行。Handling this event is useful, for example, to programmatically resize rows and columns based on content updates. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用此事件。The following code example illustrates the use of this event. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DataError As DataGridViewDataErrorEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於外部資料剖析或驗證作業擲回例外狀況時，或是嘗試讓資料來源認可資料，但卻失敗時。

span.span: Occurs when an external data-parsing or validation operation throws an exception, or when an attempt to commit data to a data source fails.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可讓您處理在資料處理作業期間，由控制項呼叫的程式碼中擲回的例外狀況。The event enables you to handle exceptions thrown in code that is called by the control during data processing operations. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). > [!NOTE] > 並屬性的通常與此事件相關聯的物件表示資料錯誤發生所在之儲存格。The and properties of the object associated with this event normally indicate the cell in which the data error occurred. 當外部資料來源中發生錯誤時，不過，在資料來源可能不提供發生錯誤的資料行。When the error occurs in an external data source, however, the data source may not provide the column in which the error occurred. 在此情況下，屬性通常會指出目前的儲存格的資料行在發生錯誤時。In this case, the property typically indicates the column of the current cell at the time of the error. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範事件處理常式。The following code example demonstrates a event handler. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CPP/employees.cpp#50)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/CS/employees.cs#50)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees#50](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn_AllColumns_Bound_Employees/VB/employees.vb#50)]

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the list or table in the data source for which the is displaying data.

value.span: 中， 會顯示資料之資料表或清單的名稱。

span.span: The name of the table or list in the for which the is displaying data.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 繫結至資料來源包含多個清單或資料表時，此屬性相當實用。This property is useful when binding to a data source that contains multiple lists or tables. 您不需要設定此屬性，繫結至包含單一清單或資料表的資料來源時。You do not need to set this property when binding to a data source that contains a single list or table. 例如，您可以繫結控制對，而不需要設定此屬性包含單一資料表。For example, you can bind a control to a that contains a single table without setting this property. 如果包含多個資料表，不過，您必須設定此屬性的其中一個資料表名稱。If the contains multiple tables, however, you must set this property to the name of one of the tables. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明這個屬性的常見用法。The following code example illustrates a common use for this property. 在範例中，控制項，名為`customersDataGridView`繫結至名為`customersDataSet`。In the example, a control named `customersDataGridView` is bound to a named `customersDataSet`. 這包含一個名為 「 客戶 」 資料表。This contains a table named "Customers". 屬性設定為資料表的名稱。The property is set to the name of the table. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#020](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#020)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#020](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#020)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 會為其顯示資料的資料來源。

span.span: Gets or sets the data source that the is displaying data for.

value.span: 包含要供 顯示之資料的物件。

span.span: The object that contains data for the to display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別支援標準的 Windows Form 資料繫結模型。The class supports the standard Windows Forms data-binding model. 這表示資料來源可以是任何類型的實作下列介面的其中一個：This means the data source can be of any type that implements one of the following interfaces: - 介面，包括一維陣列。The interface, including one-dimensional arrays. - 介面，例如和類別。The interface, such as the and classes. - 介面，例如類別。The interface, such as the class. - 介面，例如類別。The interface, such as the class. 如需特定範例，請參閱範例 > 一節和工作表結尾的這一節。For specific examples, see the Example section and the task table at the end of this section. 一般而言，您會繫結，來元件，並繫結元件到另一個資料來源，或商務物件以進行擴展。Typically, you will bind to a component and bind the component to another data source or populate it with business objects. 元件是慣用的資料來源，因為它可以繫結至各種資料來源，而且可以自動解決許多資料繫結的問題。The component is the preferred data source because it can bind to a wide variety of data sources and can resolve many data binding issues automatically. 當繫結至資料來源包含多個清單或資料表，您必須設定屬性設為指定的清單或繫結資料表的字串。When binding to a data source that contains multiple lists or tables, you must set the property to a string that specifies the list or table to bind to. 當繫結至包含多個清單或資料表，不過的元件，您可以設定屬性元件改。When binding to a component that contains multiple lists or tables, however, you can set the property of the component instead. 當繫結的物件集合，而不資料庫資料，您通常會設定屬性所傳回的物件屬性設`null`而不是使用預設值，也就是適用於資料庫的資料。When binding to an object collection rather than to database data, you will typically set the property of the object returned by the property to `null` rather than using the default value of , which is appropriate for database data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 顯示 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Displaying Data in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/displaying-data-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 下表提供相關的一般工作的直接連結屬性。The following table provides direct links to common tasks related to the property. 請參閱[逐步解說：建立主版/詳細表單使用兩個 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/creating-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md)和[How to:將物件繫結至 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-objects-to-windows-forms-datagridview-controls.md)。See [Walkthrough: Creating a Master/Detail Form Using Two Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/creating-a-master-detail-form-using-two-datagridviews.md) and [How to: Bind Objects to Windows Forms DataGridView Controls](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-objects-to-windows-forms-datagridview-controls.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化簡單資料繫結。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a simple data-bound . 它也會示範如何設定屬性。It also demonstrates how to set the property. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewSimpleBound/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 中的儲存格所要套用的預設儲存格樣式 (前提是未設定其他儲存格樣式屬性)。

span.span: Gets or sets the default cell style to be applied to the cells in the if no other cell style properties are set.
The to be applied as the default style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會顯示其使用由儲存格樣式的儲存格屬性，從其他屬性的型別繼承樣式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 透過指定的樣式屬性會影響所有的儲存格以外時覆寫透過下列屬性指定的樣式：The styles specified through the property affect all cells except when overridden by the styles specified through the following properties: - - - - - 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 取得這個屬性中，當與預設值會在建立屬性已不被存取。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 取得這個屬性的多個資料列時，這會造成效能影響。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 可能的話，使用單一設定此屬性的多個資料列。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性在主要用於顯示的控制項。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，以數種方式自訂控制項的視覺外觀，控制項設定了有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

summary.span: 使用者在資料列中輸入新記錄以便填入預設值時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user enters the row for new records so that it can be populated with default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可讓您填入新資料錄的資料列，當使用者輸入的資料列。This event lets you populate the row for new records when the user enters the row. 初始資料列的值來自的屬性每個資料行所傳回屬性。Initial values for the row come from the property of the returned by each column's property. 在資料繫結模式中，所有儲存格的資料繫結的資料行儲存在外部資料來源的值。In data bound mode, all cell values for data bound columns are stored in the external data source. 當使用者輸入新資料錄的資料列時，新的資料列會在資料來源中，才能建立就會發生事件。When the user enters the row for new records, a new row is created in the data source before the event occurs. 當您填入屬性在事件處理常式中，值會直接新增至資料來源。When you populate the property in your event handler, the values are added directly to the data source. 在虛擬模式中之後會發生此事件，,事件發生在新的資料列中的每個資料格，所以您可以在您的自訂資料存放區中儲存的預設值。In virtual mode, after this event occurs, the event occurs for each cell in the new row so that you can store the default values in your custom data store. 然後，每個資料格在新的資料列，就會發生事件擷取的值儲存在事件，隨即顯示。Then, the event occurs for each cell in the new row, retrieving the values that you stored in the event, which are then displayed. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理此事件。The following code example illustrates how this event can be handled. 在範例中，指定資料行的資料格會填入預設值。In the example, cells for the given columns are populated with default values. 針對`CustomerID` 欄中，值會從另一個方法 （未實作），會產生獨特的客戶識別碼。For the `CustomerID` column, the value is retrieved from a separate method (not implemented) that generates a unique customer ID. 若要執行此範例中，請以實際的資料行物件的名稱取代資料行名稱控制，並提供適當的預設值。To run this example, replace the column names with the names of the column objects from an actual control and provide appropriate default values. 當指定資料行名稱，您必須使用資料行物件，而不是資料行的標頭文字的名稱。When specifying columns by name, you must use the name of the column object and not the column header text. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#120](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#120)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#120](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#120)]

summary.span: 如果具有編輯控制項的儲存格位於編輯模式下，則取得目前儲存格所裝載的控制項。

span.span: Gets the control hosted by the current cell, if a cell with an editing control is in edit mode.
The hosted by the current cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果儲存格不是處於編輯模式，或資料格類型無法容納編輯控制項，這個屬性會傳回`null`。If the cell is not in edit mode or the cell type does not accommodate an editing control, this property returns `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性中的自訂儲存格類型的覆寫方法。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in an overridden method of a custom cell type. 在範例中，編輯控制項的參考是擷取、 轉換成自訂的編輯控制項類型，和接著填入儲存格的目前值。In the example, a reference to the editing control is retrieved, cast to a custom editing control type, and then populated with the current value of the cell. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[How to:Windows Forms DataGridView 儲存格主控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#210](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#210)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#210](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#210)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

summary.span: 顯示編輯儲存格的控制項時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a control for editing a cell is showing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以處理這個事件，儲存格進入編輯模式時執行的編輯控制項的自訂初始化。You can handle this event to perform custom initialization of the editing control when a cell enters edit mode. 若要自訂控制項的顯示特性，設定所傳回的物件屬性屬性。To customize the display characteristics of the control, set the properties of the object returned by the property. 若要執行其他初始化，將值轉型的屬性設定為特定控制項類型，並直接存取的成員。To perform other initialization, cast the value of the property to the specific control type and access the members directly. 例如，您可以在其中處理事件，以將事件處理常式附加至編輯控制項的事件。For example, you can handle the event to attach event-handlers to the events of the editing control. > [!NOTE] > 控制項一次裝載一個編輯控制項，並重複使用的編輯控制項，只要編輯之間都沒有變更的資料格類型。The control hosts one editing control at a time, and reuses the editing control whenever the cell type does not change between edits. 將事件處理常式附加至編輯控制項中，當您因此必須採取一些預防措施以避免多次附加相同的處理常式。When attaching event-handlers to the editing control, you must therefore take precautions to avoid attaching the same handler multiple times. 若要避免這個問題，請從您將處理常式附加至事件前的事件移除處理常式。To avoid this problem, remove the handler from the event before you attach the handler to the event. 這會讓重複資料刪除，如果處理常式已經附加到事件，但否則沒有任何作用。This will prevent duplication if the handler is already attached to the event, but will have no effect otherwise. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的範例程式碼類別概觀。For more information, see the example code in the class overview. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來變更目前儲存格的屬性。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the current cell. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的表單名為`dataGridView1`，並確定事件是事件處理常式相關聯。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and ensure that the event is associated with the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#210](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#210)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#210](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#210)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來判斷哪一個儲存格是在第一個資料列和目前顯示在控制項中的資料行。You can use this property to determine which cell is in the first row and column currently displayed in the control. 一般而言，這是在左上角，但對於從右至左的語言，它位於右上角。Typically, this is in the upper left corner, but for right-to-left languages, it is in the upper right corner. 您也可以設定這個屬性，以將控制項捲動至指定的資料格。You can also set this property to scroll the control to the indicated cell. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何確保完成排序之後，目前的儲存格為可見。The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting. 此程式碼僅適用於未繫結控制項。This code works only with an unbound control. 使用控制項繫結至外部資料來源，目前儲存格不會自動保存排序時。With a control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為`dataGridView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`. 在 C# 中，您也必須連接事件處理常式的事件。In C#, you must also connect the event to the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#150)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#150)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是環境的屬性。The property is an ambient property. 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，具有相同做為其父系預設。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 如需有關環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱類別或類別概觀。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 因為不可變 （表示您無法調整其任一屬性），您只能指派新的屬性物件。Because the is immutable (meaning that you cannot adjust any of its properties), you can only assign the property a new object. 不過，您可以根據現有的字型為新字型。However, you can base the new font on the existing font. 控制項使用的值屬性的預設值為的屬性所傳回的物件， ，和屬性。The control uses the value of the property as the default value of the properties of objects returned by the , , and properties. 變更值會自動更新， ，和屬性，變更任何繼承值的資料格的字型。Changing the value automatically updates the , , and properties, changing the font for any cell that inherits the value. 根據預設，標頭資料格覆寫的值，您可以覆寫特定資料列、 資料行和資料格的值。Header cells override the value by default, and you can override the value for specific rows, columns, and cells. 如需有關儲存格樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性。The following code example illustrates the use of this property. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[How to:建立未繫結的 Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-an-unbound-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Create an Unbound Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-create-an-unbound-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound/CS/simpleunbound.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSimpleUnbound/VB/simpleunbound.vb#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可用來判斷特定狀態中的資料格數目。This method is useful to determine the number of cells in a particular state. 若要擷取選取的資料格數目，例如，使用這個方法搭配值。To retrieve the number of selected cells, for example, use this method with the value. 這是通常更有效率，比使用屬性。This is typically more efficient than using the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個方法來判斷是否有任何在選取的資料格控制項。The following code example illustrates how to use this method to determine whether there are any cells selected in a control. 在此範例中，如果未選取任何資料格，其值透過擷取方法並顯示在控制項。In this example, if any cells are selected, their values are retrieved through the method and displayed in a control. 此程式碼是用法的剪貼簿功能之較大範例的一部分控制項。This code is part of a larger example illustrating the use of the Clipboard features of the control. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[How to:讓使用者將多個儲存格複製到剪貼簿中，從 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會擷取表示所選取的儲存格所定義之區域的資料。This method retrieves data that represents the region defined by the selected cells. 此區域是包含所有選取的資料格的最小矩形。This region is the smallest rectangle that includes all of the selected cells. 在此區域中每個所選儲存格的值會擷取藉由呼叫方法。The value for each selected cell in this region is retrieved by calling the method. 未選取的資料格，在此區域中，會使用空白預留位置值。Blank placeholder values are used for unselected cells in this region. 這個方法會結合這些值插入包含數種格式複製到剪貼簿。This method combines these values into a containing several formats for copying to the clipboard. 支援的剪貼簿格式包括， ， ，和。The supported clipboard formats include , , , and . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式加入 選取內容到剪貼簿。The following code example demonstrates how to programmatically add selected content to the Clipboard. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[How to:讓使用者將多個儲存格複製到剪貼簿中，從 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Enable Users to Copy Multiple Cells to the Clipboard from the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/enable-users-to-copy-multiple-cells-to-the-clipboard-datagridview.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是以強制重新繪製儲存格，通常不會造成重新繪製儲存格的情況很有用。This method is useful to force a cell repaint in conditions that would not normally cause a cell to be repainted. 例如，您可以使用這個方法會變更其外觀，因為外部事件的自訂儲存格類型。For example, you can use this method with a custom cell type that changes its appearance as a result of external events. 如需繪製和失效的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about painting and invalidation, see . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個方法中自訂，當滑鼠指標停留在其上繪製有自訂框線。The following code example illustrates how to use this method in a customized that is painted with a custom border when the mouse pointer rests on it. 在範例中，當滑鼠指標進入或離開其失效之儲存格。In the example, the cell is invalidated when the mouse pointer enters or leaves it. 此程式碼是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to:自訂資料格資料行中的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項和擴充其行為和外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-cells-and-columns-in-the-datagrid-by-extending-behavior.md)。This code is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize Cells and Columns in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control by Extending Their Behavior and Appearance](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-cells-and-columns-in-the-datagrid-by-extending-behavior.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 當未繫結至資料，儲存格編輯視為已認可時使用者移到另一個資料格。When the is not bound to data, the cell edit is considered committed when the user moves to another cell. 如果資料列標頭可見，鉛筆圖像 （glyph） 是包含具有未認可的變更的資料格的資料列有標頭中。If row headers are visible, a pencil glyph is present in the header for the row that contains a cell with uncommitted changes. 如果已`true`目前的儲存格的裝載編輯控制項，您可以擷取透過屬性。If is `true` and the current cell hosts an editing control, you can retrieve it through the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用屬性來判斷是否要認可儲存格值，並引發事件的處理常式從事件。The following code example uses the property to determine whether to commit a cell value and raise the event from a handler for the event. 此程式碼範例是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to:停用按鈕，按鈕資料行中的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Disable Buttons in a Button Column in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/disable-buttons-in-a-button-column-in-the-datagrid.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會傳回`true`鉛筆圖像 （glyph） 的資料列中顯示時。This property returns `true` when the pencil glyph is displayed in the row. 根據預設，屬性會一律等於值屬性，除非繫結至資料來源，已實作支援編輯或虛擬模式下使用資料列層級的認可範圍。By default, the property will always equal the value of the property, unless the is bound to a data source that supports editing, or virtual mode has been implemented to use row-level commit scope. 在這些情況下，將評估此資料列層級的屬性。In these cases, the will evaluate this property at the row level. 當使用者瀏覽離開資料列中時，控制項就會認可所有資料列變更。When the user navigates away from the row, the control commits all row changes. 使用者也可以按 CTRL + ENTER 認可資料列變更，而不需要離開資料列。The user can also press CTRL+ENTER to commit row changes without leaving the row. 若要以程式設計方式認可資料列變更，請呼叫表單的方法。To commit row changes programmatically, call the form's method. 如果您的資料來源，您也可以呼叫。If your data source is a , you can also call .
