span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to select more than one cell, row, or column of the at a time.

value.span: 如果使用者可以同時選取一個以上的儲存格、資料列或資料行，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the user can select more than one cell, row, or column at a time; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`中, 可選取多個項目 （資料格、 資料列或資料行）控制項。When the property is set to `true`, multiple elements (cells, rows, or columns) can be selected in the control. 若要選取多個項目，使用者可以按住 CTRL 鍵同時按一下來選取項目。To select multiple elements, the user can hold down the CTRL key while clicking the elements to select. 按一下以選取的第一個項目，然後按住 SHIFT 鍵，按一下以選取的最後一個項目，可以選取連續的項目。Consecutive elements can be selected by clicking the first element to select and then, while holding down the SHIFT key, clicking the last element to select. 選取範圍根據屬性。The selection scope is based on the property. 例如，如果設為，使用者可以選取多個資料行。For example, if is set to , the user can select multiple columns. 您可以使用屬性，以允許使用者選取多個項目中的控制項，並對所有選取的項目執行作業。You can use the property to allow a user to select multiple elements in the control and perform an operation on all the selected elements. 例如，使用者可以選取多個資料格，然後以滑鼠右鍵按一下選取的儲存格，以顯示捷徑功能表，顯示一組選取的資料格上執行的工作。For example, the user could select multiple cells and then right-click a selected cell to display a shortcut menu that displays a set of tasks to perform on the selected cells. 若要判斷哪一個資料格、 資料列或資料行中選取控制項，您可以存取， ，或屬性。To determine which cells, rows, or columns are selected in the control, you can access the , , or property. 若要判斷選取的資料格數目，請呼叫方法的引數值。To determine the number of selected cells, call the method with an argument value of . 使用方法來擷取選取的資料列的數目和方法來擷取資料行數目。Use the method to retrieve the number of selected rows and the method to retrieve the number of columns. 這些方法會比直接存取集合，使用大量資料時更有效率。These methods are more efficient than accessing the collections directly when working with large amounts of data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的表單名為`dataGridView1`，然後呼叫`SetUpDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and then call the `SetUpDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 請確定其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。Ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewUnbound/VB/form1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是在虛擬模式中，此事件可讓在新的資料列的資料存放區中建立新的項目，而且它也允許資料列填入預設值。When the is in virtual mode, this event allows a new entry to be created in the data store for the new row, and it also allows for the row to be populated with default values. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用事件來追蹤新的資料列在新增時，在邏輯事件處理常式可以初始化為初始值的新資料列的資料格。The following code example uses the event to track when a new row is being added, so logic in the event handler can initialize a new row's cell to an initial value. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `clipBounds`參數表示的區域，需要重新繪製。The `clipBounds` parameter represents the area of the that needs to be repainted. 例如，如果使用者涵蓋整個另一個視窗，然後能夠抓出它，然後`clipBounds`代表整個。For example, if a user covers the entire with another window and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the entire . 如果使用者涵蓋的範圍縮小，然後發現，`clipBounds`表示所涵蓋的範圍縮小。If a user covers a small area of the and then uncovers it, then `clipBounds` represents the small area that was covered.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫的金鑰處理方法適用於按鍵 (例如方法在按下 F2 時)，並傳回該方法的傳回值。This method calls the key-processing method appropriate to the key pressed (for example, the method when F2 is pressed) and returns the return value of that method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何變更在 ENTER 鍵行為藉由覆寫子類別和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to change the behavior of the ENTER key in a subclass by overriding the and methods. 在範例中，ENTER 鍵會具有相同的行為，向右箭號的索引鍵，方便使用者無法編輯資料的單一資料列中的多個資料格。In the example, the ENTER key has the same behavior as the RIGHT ARROW key, making it easier for a user to edit multiple cells in a single row of data. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 儲存格為唯讀如果的值屬性是`true`儲存格、 儲存格的資料列儲存格的資料行，或。A cell is read-only if the value of the property is `true` for the cell, the cell's row, the cell's column, or the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性在主要用於顯示的控制項。The following code example illustrates the use of this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，以數種方式自訂控制項的視覺外觀，控制項設定了有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

exception.span: 當設定這個屬性為 、目前的儲存格處於編輯模式，以及目前的儲存格包含無法認可的變更時所指定的值。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property is , the current cell is in edit mode, and the current cell contains changes that cannot be committed.

exception.span: 設定這個屬性時所指定的值會讓控制項進入編輯模式，但編輯儲存格值的初始設定失敗，而且 事件沒有處理常式或處理常式已將 屬性設定為 。

span.span: The specified value when setting this property would cause the control to enter edit mode, but initialization of the editing cell value failed and either there is no handler for the event or the handler has set the property to .

exception.span: 例外狀況物件通常可轉換成 類型。

summary.span: 發生於 屬性變更時。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#274](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#274)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#274](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#274)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool RefreshEdit() cil managed

summary.span: 儲存格在編輯模式下時，使用基礎儲存格值重新整理目前儲存格的值，並捨棄先前的任何值。

span.span: Refreshes the value of the current cell with the underlying cell value when the cell is in edit mode, discarding any previous value.

returns.span: 如果成功，則為 ；如果發生 事件，則為 。

span.span: if successful; if a event occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫這個方法，以強制更新在編輯模式中的顯示值的資料格。Call this method to force a cell to update its display value in edit mode. 當外部處理序會修改儲存格的值，而且您想要的變更，使用者甚至變更時通知使用者指定遺失如此一來，這非常有用。This is useful when an external process modifies the cell value and you want to notify the user of the change, even when a user-specified change is lost as a result.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 才會發生事件時控制屬性設定或其屬性是`true`。The event occurs only when the control property is set or its property is `true`. 處理事件很有用，當您想要顯示的捷徑功能表，取決於資料列的目前狀態或它所包含的值。Handling the event is useful when you want to display a shortcut menu determined by a row's current state or the values it contains. 當您處理事件，您指定的處理常式中的捷徑功能表會顯示每次使用者以滑鼠右鍵按一下資料列除非覆寫已按下的特定資料格的捷徑功能表。When you handle the event, the shortcut menu that you specify in the handler is shown whenever the user right-clicks a row unless the overrides the shortcut menu for the specific cell that was clicked. 也就會發生事件時的值已擷取屬性，或是以程式設計的方式，或當使用者按一下滑鼠右鍵的資料列。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved, either programmatically or when the user right-clicks a row. 您可以使用屬性來判斷、 包含的值或資料列的狀態，並使用此資訊來變更或修改屬性。You can use the property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the property. 這個屬性會使用資料列的值初始化屬性，它會覆寫的事件值。This property is initialized with the value of the row property, which the event value overrides. 處理事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定資料列多個資料列的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row value for multiple rows. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件來提供根據員工的職稱。The following code example handles the event to provide a based on the title of the employee. 在此範例中，有兩個快顯功能表，一個為管理員，一個用於所有其他員工。In this example, there are two shortcut menus, one for managers and one for all other employees. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/CS/Form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView_NeededEvents/VB/Form1.vb#10)]

span.span: Gets or sets the number of rows displayed in the .

value.span: 要顯示在 中的資料列數目。

span.span: The number of rows to display in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果設定的值小於目前的值，資料列會移除從結尾集合。If is set to a value less than the current value, rows will be removed from the end of the collection. 如果設定為大於目前的值的值，資料列會加入結尾集合。If is set to a value greater than the current value, rows will be added to the end of the collection. 額外的資料列會根據在指定的資料列屬性。The additional rows are based on the row specified in the property. 如果您設定屬性設為 0，所有資料列會移除。If you set the property to 0, all rows will be removed from the . 這就相當於呼叫方法。This is equivalent to calling the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果已`true`，您不能設定設為 0。If is `true`, you cannot set to 0. 在此情況下，呼叫方法來移除新記錄的資料列以外的所有資料列。In this case, call the method to remove all rows except the row for new records. 呼叫具有相同的結果，作為設定為 1，在此情況下，但速度會更快。Calling has the same result as setting to 1 in this case, but is much faster. 屬性可以搭配屬性來建立簡單來顯示和編輯文字。The property can be used with the property to create a simple for displaying and editing text. 如果您設定屬性設為大於 0 的值沒有資料行，控制會自動新增。If you set the property to a value greater than 0 for a control without columns, a is added automatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property. 在此範例中，這個屬性用來追蹤中的項目數。In this example, this property is used to track the number of entries in a . 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. summary.span: 發生於資料列的 屬性值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property for a row changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 任何時，就會發生此事件屬性所傳回屬性的資料列設定為新的值，或當的資料列的屬性設定為新具有至少一個屬性值不同於上一個儲存格樣式物件。This event occurs when any property of the returned by the property for a row is set to a new value or when the property for a row is set to a new with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#340](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#340)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#340](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#340)]

summary.span: 發生於 控制項的 屬性為 ，且 需要判斷目前的資料列是否有未認可的變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the property of the control is and the needs to determine whether the current row has uncommitted changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，此事件設定屬性設`true`如果目前的資料列中的任何資料格已經被修改。By default, this event sets the property to `true` if any cells in the current row have been modified. 這會導致事件發生時使用者會還原到資料列的編輯。This causes the event to occur when the user reverts edits to a row. 使用者可以按下 esc 鍵，儲存格處於編輯模式或一次之外編輯模式時，兩次還原的資料列的編輯。Users can revert edits to a row by pressing ESC twice when a cell is in edit mode or once outside of edit mode. 此事件可用於自訂設定的虛擬模式中的認可範圍屬性設為正確的值，視所選的認可範圍而定。This event can be used for customizing commit scope in virtual mode by setting the property to the correct value depending on the chosen commit scope. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何處理這個事件來提供資料格層級認可範圍內，這表示使用者可以還原到目前的儲存格的變更。The following code example demonstrates how to handle this event to provide cell-level commit scope, meaning that the user can revert changes to the current cell only. 在資料格層級認可範圍內，資料列會被視為具有未認可變更時，才目前儲存格有未經認可的變更，而不是當資料列中的任何資料格有未經認可的變更。In cell-level commit scope, the row is treated as having uncommitted changes only when the current cell has uncommitted changes, rather than when any cell in the row has uncommitted changes. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[逐步解說：實作虛擬模式中的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [Walkthrough: Implementing Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/implementing-virtual-mode-wf-datagridview-control.md). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#160](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CPP/virtualmode.cpp#160)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#160](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/CS/virtualmode.cs#160)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode#160](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.VirtualMode/VB/virtualmode.vb#160)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

summary.span: 使用者按兩下兩列資料列之間的分割線時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user double-clicks the divider between two rows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個事件自訂發生於使用者按兩下資料列分割線的自動調整大小行為。You can use this event to customize the automatic sizing behavior that occurs when a user double-clicks a row divider. 資料列屬性不會擴充的區域，使用者可以連按兩下。The row property does not extend the area in which a user can double-click. 如果已經透過這個屬性使用增加的分割線的高度，當使用者按兩下分割線與相鄰的資料行之間的界限時，就會發生此事件。If the height of a divider has been increased through the use of this property, this event occurs when the user double-clicks the boundary between the divider and the adjacent column. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#342](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#342)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#342](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#342)]

summary.span: 發生於資料列收到輸入焦點，但尚未變成目前的資料列之前。

span.span: Occurs when a row receives input focus but before it becomes the current row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個事件發生時初始載入，以及當使用者選取目前的資料列以外的資料列。This event occurs when the is initially loaded, as well as when the user selects a row other than the current row. 這個事件發生之前屬性更新。This event occurs before the property is updated. 若要擷取的新輸入資料列的索引，請使用事件處理常式內的屬性。To retrieve the index of the newly-entered row, use the property within the event handler. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何處理這個事件來變更中目前資料列的資料格的屬性。The following code example illustrates how to handle this event to change the property of the cells in the current row. 在此範例中，設定的背景色彩事件，然後重設上事件。In this example, the background color is set in the event, then reset to on the event. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的表單名為`dataGridView1`，並確保其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`, and ensure that all events are associated with their event handlers. summary.span: 發生於需要資料列的錯誤文字時。

span.span: Occurs when a row's error text is needed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 才會發生事件時屬性控制項設定或其屬性是`true`。The event occurs only when the property of the control is set or its property is `true`. 處理事件很有用，當您想要判斷根據其狀態和它包含值的資料列的錯誤。Handling the event is useful when you want to determine the error for a row depending on its state and the values it contains. 當您處理事件，並指定錯誤文字中處理常式中，資料列標題會顯示錯誤圖像 （glyph） 除非屬性設定為`false`。When you handle the event and specify error text in the handler, an error glyph appears in the row header unless the property is set to `false`. 當使用者將滑鼠指標移錯誤圖像 （glyph） 時，錯誤文字會出現在工具提示中。When the user moves the mouse pointer over the error glyph, the error text appears in a ToolTip. 也就會發生事件時的值已擷取屬性。The event also occurs whenever the value of the property is retrieved. 您可以使用屬性來判斷、 包含的值或資料列的狀態，並使用此資訊來變更或修改屬性。You can use the property to determine the state of a row or the values it contains, and use this information to change or modify the property. 這個屬性會使用資料列的值初始化屬性，它會覆寫的事件值。This property is initialized with the value of the row property, which the event value overrides. 處理事件時使用大量的資料，以避免效能的負面影響的設定資料列多個資料列的值。Handle the event when working with large amounts of data to avoid the performance penalties of setting the row value for multiple rows. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowHeaderCellChanged As DataGridViewRowEventHandler

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值傳回由這個屬性具有下列的初始屬性值。The default returned by this property has the following initial property values. |DataGridViewCellStyle 屬性DataGridViewCellStyle property|預設值Default value| |------------------------------------|-------------------| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| || 屬性的值。The value of the property.| ||| ||| 這些值會自動覆寫透過設定的值屬性。These values automatically override the values set through the property. 若要強制繼承的資料列行首值，您必須設定的值設為預設值的物件指定類別。To force row headers to inherit the values, you must set the values in the object to the default values indicated for the class. 如需有關儲存格樣式繼承的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性在使用自訂色彩。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a with custom colors. 請注意如何屬性設定為以便值繼承自物件。Note how the property is set to so that the value is inherited from the object. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中所提供的類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example provided in the class overview. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可用來調整資料列的標頭資料行，為指定的寬度。The property can be used to resize the row header column to a specified width. 若要調整此欄位至最適大小的資料列的標頭儲存格內容的寬度，請使用方法。To adjust the width of this column to fit the contents of the row header cells, use the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用在資料列繪製的案例中的屬性。The following code example illustrates how to use the property in a row-painting scenario. 在範例中，這個屬性的值用來計算在其中繪製自訂背景的界限。In the example, the value of this property is used to calculate the bounds within which a custom background is drawn. 此程式碼是中提供之較大範例的一部分[How to:自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列的外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This code is part of a larger example available in[How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出資料列標頭的寬度是否可以調整，以及使用者是否可以調整此寬度，或是會配合標頭內容，自動調整此寬度。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the width of the row headers is adjustable and whether it can be adjusted by the user or is automatically adjusted to fit the contents of the headers.

value.span: 值，指出資料列標頭的寬度可以根據哪一個模式來調整。

span.span: A value indicating the mode by which the width of the row headers can be adjusted.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性設定為自動調整大小模式時，無法由使用者調整資料列行首的寬度。When this property is set to an automatic sizing mode, the width of the row headers cannot be adjusted by the user. 若要以程式設計方式調整資料列行首的高度，請使用方法或一組屬性。To adjust the height of the row headers programmatically, use the method or set the property. 若要設定資料行行首的調整大小模式，使用屬性。To set the sizing mode for the column headers, use the property. 如需標頭調整大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的調整大小選項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about header sizing, see [Sizing Options in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/sizing-options-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). > [!NOTE] > 控制項不支援雙重緩衝。The control does not support double buffering. 如果設定為`true`中衍生控制項，在調整大小時，資料列、 資料行或標頭，或重新排序資料行時，使用者不會接收視覺化回饋。If is set to `true` in a derived control, users will not receive visual feedback when resizing rows, columns, or headers or when reordering columns. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性在主要用於顯示的控制項。The following code example illustrates how to use this property in a control intended primarily for display. 在此範例中，以數種方式自訂控制項的視覺外觀，控制項設定了有限的互動性。In this example, the visual appearance of the control is customized in several ways and the control is configured for limited interactivity. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

summary.span: 要求有關資料列高度的資訊時發生。

span.span: Occurs when information about row height is requested.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可用於排序作業之後保留自訂的資料列的高度。This event is useful for preserving custom row heights after a sorting operation. 這是必要的因為排序作業通常會由資料來源，不會不追蹤的資料列與控制項中的資料列之間的對應。This is necessary because sorting operations are normally handled by the data source, which does not keep track of the correspondence between rows of data and rows in the control. 只會發生此事件時已經設定屬性或當屬性是`true`。This event occurs only when the property has been set or when the property is `true`. 在後者的情況下，您可以提供您自己的資料存放區和排序作業。In the latter case, you provide your own data store and sorting operations. 處理事件，以儲存更新的高度資訊，當使用者變更資料列高度。Handle the event to store updated height information when the user changes a row height. 使用需要它的控制項時，擷取預存的高度資訊。Use to retrieve the stored height information when the control needs it. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#351](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#351)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#351](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#351)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

summary.span: 使用者變更資料列的高度時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the user changes the height of a row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會引發這個事件時屬性設定為`true`或以外的其他屬性設定為值`null`。This event is raised when the property is set to `true` or the property is set to a value other than `null`. 此事件用來追蹤和儲存資料列高度的資訊，以便它可以在排序作業之後還原。This event is used to track and store row height information so that it can be restored after a sorting operation. 若要還原高度資訊，請處理事件。To restore height information, handle the event. 請注意，只有當使用者變更資料列的高度時，才發生此事件。Note that this event occurs only when the user changes the height of a row. 如果您以程式設計方式變更資料列的高度，您必須儲存在同一時間的新高度資訊。If you change the height of a row programmatically, you must store the new height information at the same time. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#352](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#352)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#352](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#352)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowPostPaint As DataGridViewRowPostPaintEventHandler

summary.span: 發生在繪製 之後。

span.span: Occurs after a is painted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以處理這個事件，單獨使用或搭配事件，以自訂控制項中的資料列的外觀。You can handle this event alone or in combination with the event to customize the appearance of rows in the control. 您可以繪製整個資料列，或 [小畫家] 的資料列的特定部分，並使用下列方法繪製其他組件的類別：You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the class to paint other parts: - - - - - 您也可以使用繪製使用目前的佈景主題的標準控制項的類別。You can also use the class to paint standard controls using the current theme. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 呈現具有視覺化樣式的控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). 如果您使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，您也可以存取您可以搭配使用的標準映像的大型程式庫來控制項。If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the control. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式事件來繪製文字的內容跨越整個資料列，低於一般的儲存格的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to paint textual content that spans the entire row below the normal cell values. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[How to:自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列的外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#30](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#30)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#30](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#30)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以處理這個事件，單獨使用或搭配事件，以自訂控制項中的資料列的外觀。You can handle this event alone or in combination with the event to customize the appearance of rows in the control. 您可以繪製整個資料列，或 [小畫家] 的資料列的特定部分，並使用下列方法繪製其他組件的類別：You can paint entire rows yourself, or paint specific parts of rows and use the following methods of the class to paint other parts: - - - - - 您也可以使用繪製使用目前的佈景主題的標準控制項的類別。You can also use the class to paint standard controls using the current theme. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 呈現具有視覺化樣式的控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md)。For more information, see [Rendering Controls with Visual Styles](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/rendering-controls-with-visual-styles.md). 如果您使用[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]，您也可以存取您可以搭配使用的標準映像的大型程式庫來控制項。If you are using [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)], you also have access to a large library of standard images that you can use with the control. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用的處理常式事件來繪製漸層的資料列的背景，如果在選取的資料列。The following code example demonstrates how to use a handler for the event to paint a gradient row background if the row is selected. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中提供的[How to:自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的資料列的外觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Customize the Appearance of Rows in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/customize-the-appearance-of-rows-in-the-datagrid.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/CS/datagridviewrowpainting.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowPainting/VB/datagridviewrowpainting.vb#20)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Rows As DataGridViewRowCollection

summary.span: 取得集合，其中包含 控制項中的所有資料列。

span.span: Gets a collection that contains all the rows in the control.
A that contains all the rows in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用集合來手動填入而不是繫結至資料來源的控制項。You can use the collection to manually populate a control instead of binding it to a data source. 下列範例會示範如何手動新增，並插入資料列。The following example shows you how to manually add and insert rows. 這個範例假設您已新增四個控制項的執行個體集合。This example assumes that you have added four instances to the control's collection. ```vb Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight") Me.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four") ``` ```csharp this.dataGridView1.Rows.Add("five", "six", "seven", "eight");this.dataGridView1.Rows.Insert(0, "one", "two", "three", "four"); ``` 如需詳細的範例，以程式設計方式填入 解除繫結控制項，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節。For a detailed example that programmatically populates an unbound control, see the Example section. 資料列包含資料格的值以外的樣式資訊。Rows include style information in addition to cell values. 基於這個理由，您可能想要新增或將根據您已設定樣式的現有資料列的資料列插入。For this reason, you might want to add or insert rows based on existing rows that you have already styled. 您可以使用， ， ，和方法。You can do this using the , , , and methods. 您也可以使用修改控制項中的值，或移除資料列的集合。You can also use the collection to modify the values in the control or to remove rows. 您可以修改值，或移除資料列，不論控制項是否繫結至外部資料來源。You can modify values or remove rows regardless of whether the control is bound to an external data source. 如果沒有資料來源，所做的變更會對直接資料來源。If there is a data source, the changes are made directly to the data source. 此外，您可能仍然需要將資料來源更新推送至遠端資料庫，不過。You may still need to push the data source updates to a remote database, however. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[＜How to：資料繫結至 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-data-to-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [How to: Bind Data to the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-bind-data-to-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 下列範例會示範如何以程式設計方式修改資料格的值。The following example shows you how to modify cell values programmatically. ```vb ' Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. Me.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value" ' The previous line is equivalent to the following line. Me.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value" ``` ```csharp // Modify the value in the first cell of the second row. this.dataGridView1.Rows[1].Cells[0].Value = "new value"; // The previous line is equivalent to the following line. this.dataGridView1[0, 1].Value = "new value"; ``` 除了標準集合的功能，您可以使用擷取資料列的相關資訊的集合。In addition to the standard collection capabilities, you can use the collection to retrieve information about rows. 使用方法，以判斷特定的資料列的狀態。Use the method to determine the state of a particular row. 使用和方法來判斷資料列數目或特定狀態中的資料列結合的高度。Use the and methods to determine the number of rows or the combined height of rows in a particular state. 若要擷取具有特定狀態的資料列的索引，請使用， ， ，和方法。To retrieve the index of a row with a particular state, use the , , , and methods. 下列範例會示範如何擷取的第一個選取的資料列中，索引，然後用它來以程式設計方式刪除資料列。The following example shows you how to retrieve the index of the first selected row, and then use it to programmatically delete the row. ```vb Dim rowToDelete As Int32 = Me.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( _ DataGridViewElementStates.Selected) If rowToDelete > -1 Then Me.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete) End If ``` ```csharp Int32 rowToDelete = this.dataGridView1.Rows.GetFirstRow( DataGridViewElementStates.Selected); if (rowToDelete > -1) { this.dataGridView1.Rows.RemoveAt(rowToDelete); } ``` 為了改善效能，所傳回屬性可包含共用和非共用的資料列。To improve performance, the returned by the property can include shared and unshared rows. 共用的資料列共用記憶體，以減少大型的記錄集的成本。Shared rows share memory to reduce the cost of a large record set. 如果您的資料錄集非常大，您應該小心存取時保持共用的資料列是盡量屬性。If your record set is very large, you should be careful to keep the rows shared as much as possible when accessing the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立未繫結; set ， ，以及屬性，並使用和屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to create an unbound ; set the , , and properties; and use the and properties. 它也會示範如何使用新版和正確調整大小的資料行的標頭和資料列的方法。It also demonstrates how to use a version of the and methods to properly size the column headers and the rows. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為`dataGridView1`和名為按鈕`Button1`，然後呼叫`InitializeDataGridView`從表單的建構函式的方法或事件處理常式。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and a button named `Button1`, and then call the `InitializeDataGridView` method from the form's constructor or event handler. 請確定所有的事件都已連接其事件處理常式。Ensure all events are connected with their event handlers. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.GridViewAutoSize/VB/form1.vb#2)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event RowsAdded As DataGridViewRowsAddedEventHandler

summary.span: 發生於新的資料列加入 之後。

span.span: Occurs after a new row is added to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 加入新的資料列時，不會自動排序控制項中的資料列。Rows in the control are not automatically sorted when new rows are added. 若要排序新的資料列至其正確的位置，請呼叫方法中的事件處理常式。To sort new rows into their correct position, call the method in a event handler. 當使用者將新的記錄，使用的資料列的新資料列值的處理常式中這個事件是相等的新記錄，資料列的新位置的索引是其中一種大於剛才加入的資料列。When the user adds a new row using the row for new records, the value in the handler for this event is equal to the index of the new location of the row for new records, which is one greater than the row just added. 當您將加入資料列以程式設計的方式，不過，值是第一個加入的資料列的索引。When you add rows programmatically, however, the value is the index of the first row added. 在虛擬模式中，會發生此事件之前事件，可用來建立新的記錄，然後您可以在填入您的資料存放區中事件處理常式。In virtual mode, this event occurs before the event and can be used to create new records in your data store that you can then populate in the event handler. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會處理事件，以在虛擬機器中的資料列數目增加。The following code example handles the event to increment the number of rows in a virtual . 資料列數目會在處理常式，讓它知道何時要顯示與新的資料列的初始化資料格的空白儲存格。The number of rows is used in the handler so it knows when to show a blank cell versus an initialized cell for a new row. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分參考主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the reference topic. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CPP/virtual.cpp#20)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#20)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 的資料列儲存格所套用的預設樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the default style applied to the row cells of the .

value.span: 的資料列儲存格所要套用的 。

span.span: The to apply to the row cells of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項會顯示其使用由儲存格樣式的儲存格屬性，從其他屬性的型別繼承樣式。The control displays its cells using the styles indicated by the cell property, which inherits styles from other properties of type . 所有資料列中的資料格，但不包括標頭資料格，透過指定的樣式屬性覆寫透過指定的樣式和屬性，並透過指定的樣式會覆寫， ，和屬性。For cells in all rows, excluding header cells, the styles specified through the property override the styles specified through the and properties, and are overridden by the styles specified through the , , and properties. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Windows Forms DataGridView 控制項中的儲存格樣式](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 取得這個屬性中，當與預設值會在建立屬性已不被存取。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the property has not already been accessed. 取得這個屬性的多個資料列時，這會造成效能影響。This can cause a performance impact when getting this property for many rows. 可能的話，使用單一設定此屬性的多個資料列。Whenever possible, use a single to set this property for multiple rows. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 縮放 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項的最佳作法](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information, see [Best Practices for Scaling the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/best-practices-for-scaling-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用這個屬性來建立在分類帳效果控制項。The following code example illustrates how to use this property to create a ledger effect in a control. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewStyleDemo/VB/form1.vb#20)]

summary.span: 發生於 屬性的值變更時。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個事件發生時的屬性所傳回屬性設定為新的值或當屬性設定為新具有至少一個屬性值不同於先前的儲存格樣式物件。This event occurs when a property of the returned by the property is set to a new value or when the property is set to a new with at least one property value different than the previous cell style object. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當從刪除資料列控制項，後續的資料列的索引編號來彌補較低的環境。When rows are deleted from a control, the index numbers of subsequent rows are lowered to compensate. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個事件來平衡之資料行的值更新。The following code example demonstrates how to use this event to update the values in a balance column of a . 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewRow ^ RowTemplate { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewRow ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridViewRow ^ value); };
member this.RowTemplate : System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定表示控制項中所有資料列之樣板的資料列。

span.span: Gets or sets the row that represents the template for all the rows in the control.
A representing the row template.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有時候您想進一步控制的外觀資料列比所提供的各種儲存格樣式屬性。Sometimes you want greater control over the appearance of rows than what is provided by the various cell style properties. 屬性可讓您建立和初始化用於做為範本的所有資料列的資訊，包括新的記錄的資料列如果是`true`。The property lets you create and initialize a for use as a template by all rows, including the row for new records if is `true`. 當您設定的屬性，例如資料列高度預設值，這非常有用。This is useful when you are setting default values for properties such as row height. 例如，您可以增加預設的資料列高度，以便可以提供額外的空間，一般的儲存格內容下方顯示跨越多個資料行的內容。For example, you may want to increase the default row height in order to provide extra room beneath ordinary cell content for displaying content that spans multiple columns. 設定資料列範本時，需要外部的資料會顯示使用自訂的型別衍生自類別。Setting the row template is necessary when external data is displayed using custom types derived from the class. 使用未繫結控制項，您可以以程式設計方式填入您自訂的資料列型別的執行個體的集合。With unbound controls, you can programmatically populate the collection with instances of your custom row type. 顯示外部資料時，不過，資料列會自動產生，但它們基礎資料列範本，您可以設定為您自訂的資料列型別的執行個體。When displaying external data, however, the rows are generated automatically, but they are based on the row template, which you can set to an instance of your custom row type. 如果這個屬性尚未設定擷取其值的第一次新會建立並傳回。If this property has not been set the first time you retrieve its value, a new is created and returned. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用資料列 範本來指定初始的資料列高度和資料列最低高度。The following code example illustrates how to use the row template to specify an initial row height and a minimum row height. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate/CPP/datagridviewrowtemplate.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate/CS/datagridviewrowtemplate.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowTemplate/VB/datagridviewrowtemplate.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以開發和測試期間使用這個事件，以協助識別導致從共用變更為非共用狀態的資料列的程式碼。You can use this event during development and testing to help identify code that causes rows to change from a shared to an unshared state. 縮放控制項來顯示大量資料時，這非常有用。This is useful when scaling the control to display large amounts of data. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#360](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#360)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#360](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#360)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個事件是類似於事件。This event is analogous to the event. 您可以使用這個事件值的資料列上執行的後續處理。Use this event to perform post-processing on a row of values. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用此事件，清除可能留下驗證資料列之後的任何錯誤註釋。The following code sample uses this event to clear up any error annotations that may have been left behind after validating the row. summary.span: 正在驗證資料列時發生。

span.span: Occurs when a row is validating.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個事件是類似於事件。This event is analogous to the event. 您可以使用這個事件的資料列的所有值上執行驗證。Use this event to perform validation on all the values of a row. 如果資料列未通過驗證，設定屬性設`true`。If the row does not pass validation, set the property to `true`. 取消這個事件會防止， ，和事件發生時，也會防止使用者離開無效的資料列並防止資料列儲存至外部資料來源中資料繫結模式。Canceling this event prevents the , , and events from occurring, and also prevents the user from leaving the invalid row and prevents the row from being saved to an external data source in data bound mode. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用檢查如果輸入有效的追蹤和發行日期。The following code example uses to check if valid track and release dates are entered. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowOperations#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowOperations/CS/rowoperations.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowOperations#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.RowOperations/VB/rowoperations.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不論這個屬性的值，只在需要時才顯示捲軸。Regardless of the value of this property, scroll bars are shown only when they are needed. 您可以使用這個屬性來防止捲軸出現。Use this property to prevent scroll bars from appearing. 例如，當您想要提供替代的使用者介面 (UI) 捲動時，這非常有用。This is useful, for example, when you want to provide an alternative user interface (UI) for scrolling.

summary.span: 選取 中的所有儲存格。

span.span: Selects all the cells in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當是在資料行選取模式和這個方法中呼叫時，每個資料行屬性設定為`true`，和每個資料列屬性設定為`false`。When the is in column-selection mode and this method is called, each column's property is set to `true`, and each row's property is set to `false`. 相反地，當是在資料列選取範圍模式和這個方法中呼叫時，每個資料列屬性設定為`true`，和每個資料行屬性設定為`false`。Conversely, when the is in row-selection mode and this method is called, each row's property is set to `true`, and each column's property is set to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 若要執行此範例中，貼上程式碼包含表單的表單名為`dataGridView1`並名為`selectAllButton`，並確保其事件處理常式相關聯的所有事件。To run this example, paste the code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1` and a named `selectAllButton`, and ensure all events are associated with their event handlers. span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectedCells As DataGridViewSelectedCellCollection

summary.span: 取得使用者所選的儲存格集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of cells selected by the user.
A that represents the cells selected by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性一律會填入不論屬性值。The property is always populated regardless of the property value. 此屬性包含在其被參考的時間選取範圍的唯讀快照集。This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced. 如果您保留此集合的複本，它可能不同於實際後續所在使用者可能已變更選取範圍的狀態。If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent state in which the user may have changed the selection. 因此，您不應該對集合的複本。Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用集合選取範圍中尋找值的總和。The following code example demonstrates how to use the collection to find the sum of the values in the selection. 在範例中，這個集合會逐一查看並有效的值會加入至顯示在標籤的總和。In the example, this collection is iterated through and the valid values are added to the sum, which is displayed in a label. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/VB/form1.vb#10)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectedColumns As DataGridViewSelectedColumnCollection

summary.span: 取得使用者所選的資料行集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of columns selected by the user.
A that represents the columns selected by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性必須設為或是如屬性來填入選取的資料行。The property must be set to or for the property to be populated with selected columns. 此屬性包含在其被參考的時間選取範圍的唯讀快照集。This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced. 如果您保留此集合的複本，它可能不同於實際後續所在使用者可能已變更選取範圍的狀態。If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent state in which the user may have changed the selection. 因此，您不應該對集合的複本。Therefore, you should not operate on a copy of the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性來取得所選資料行中以程式設計方式排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to get the selected column in a programmatic sort. 在此範例中，這個屬性用於方法，以判斷排序方向。In this example, this property is used in the method to determine the direction of the sort. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DatagridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DatagridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/VB/form1.vb#10)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectedRows As DataGridViewSelectedRowCollection

summary.span: 取得使用者所選的資料列集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of rows selected by the user.
A that contains the rows selected by the user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性必須設為或是如屬性來填入選取的資料列。The property must be set to or for the property to be populated with selected rows. 此屬性包含在其被參考的時間選取範圍的唯讀快照集。This property contains a read-only snapshot of the selection at the time it is referenced. 如果您保留此集合的複本，它可能不同於實際後續所在使用者可能已變更選取範圍的狀態。If you hold onto a copy of this collection, it may differ from the actual, subsequent state in which the user may have changed the selection. 您因此不應該作業集合的複本上。You should therefore not operate on a copy of the collection. 若要以程式設計方式選取的資料列，將其屬性設`true`。To programmatically select a row, set its property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性中的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in the event. 在此範例中，如果第一個資料列包含在集合中，則刪除已取消。In this example, if the first row is contained in the collection, then the deletion is canceled. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分事件。This example is part of a larger example available in the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/CS/form1.cs#20)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#20](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/VB/form1.vb#20)]

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SelectionChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 目前選取範圍變更時發生。

span.span: Occurs when the current selection changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會選取資料格，或取消選取項目，以程式設計方式或由使用者動作時，就會發生此事件。This event occurs whenever cells are selected or the selection is canceled, whether programmatically or by user action. 例如，此事件很有用，當您想要顯示目前選取的資料格的總和。For example, this event is useful when you want display the sum of the currently selected cells. 當您變更的值屬性，事件發生之前事件。When you change the value of the property, the event occurs before the event. 任何事件處理常式存取屬性此時會取得先前的值。Any event handler accessing the property at this time will get its previous value. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用此事件。The following code example demonstrates the use of this event. 在範例中，此表單會顯示選取的資料格的值的總和，並選取項目變更時更新總和。In the example, the form displays the sum of values in the selected cells, and updates the sum when the selection changes. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#00](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/CS/form1.cs#00)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum#00](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionSum/VB/form1.vb#00)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制會變更目前的儲存格時，會使用這個方法。The control uses this method whenever it changes the current cell. 這個方法會變更目前的儲存格，而不需要變更選取項目，並選擇性地而不驗證上一個儲存格，或變更選取範圍的錨定儲存格。This method changes the current cell without changing the selection and optionally without validating the previous cell or changing the selection anchor cell. 錨定儲存格是第一個資料格區塊的使用者可以選取按住 SHIFT 鍵並按一下區塊的最後一個儲存格的多個資料格。The anchor cell is the first cell of a block of multiple cells that the user can select by holding down the SHIFT key and clicking the last cell of the block. 如果`rowIndex`並`columnIndex`是這兩種-1，屬性會傳回`null`。If `rowIndex` and `columnIndex` are both -1, the property returns `null`.

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not ToolTips will show when the mouse pointer pauses on a cell.

value.span: 如果已啟用儲存格的工具提示，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if cell ToolTips are enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個屬性的值是`true`和滑鼠指標位於儲存格上方儲存格時，會顯示工具提示其中下列條件成立：When the value of this property is `true` and the mouse pointer is over a cell, the cell displays a ToolTip when one of the following conditions is met: - 值屬性不是`null`或值屬性是`true`，以及處理常式事件集以外的值的屬性。The value of the property is not `null` or the value of the property is `true`, and a handler for the event sets the property to a value other than . - 資料格的屬性具有值以外的其他。The property of the cell has a value other than . 設定這個屬性沒有任何作用，當有事件處理常式會自動取得屬性的值因為引發事件並傳回的工具提示文字指定在事件處理常式。Setting this property has no effect when there is a event handler because getting the value of the property automatically raises the event and returns the ToolTip text specified in the event handler. - 儲存格的值會截斷資料格顯示中。The cell value is truncated in the cell display. 當儲存格的值屬性值是，截斷的資料格的值的完整值會顯示在工具提示。When the value of the cell property value is , the full value of the truncated cell value is displayed in the ToolTip.

member this.ShowEditingIcon : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出正在編輯的儲存格之資料列行首中是否可以看到編輯圖像 (Glyph)。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether or not the editing glyph is visible in the row header of the cell being edited.

value.span: 如果可以看到編輯圖像，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the editing glyph is visible; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 資料列標頭會顯示目前儲存格處於編輯模式，以及使用者對其進行變更的資料格時，看起來像鉛筆的編輯字符。The row header will display an editing glyph that looks like a pencil when the current cell is in edit mode and the user has made changes to the cell. 編輯字符著色使用資料列的標頭資料格的屬性。The editing glyph is colored by using the property of the row header cell. 如果沒有足夠的空間可以完整顯示，則不會呈現圖像 （glyph）。The glyph is not rendered if there is not enough space to display it completely. 例如，如果資料列的標頭儲存格有其屬性集，圖像 （glyph） 會移除，如果沒有足夠的空間為文字和圖像 （glyph）。For example, if the row header cell has its property set, the glyph is removed if there is not enough room for both the text and glyph. 值所控制的編輯字符顯示虛擬模式中的屬性。The display of the editing glyph is controlled by the value of the property in virtual mode. 否則，它由控制屬性。Otherwise, it is controlled by the property. 標準的圖像 （glyph） 的格式不公開。The standard glyph is not publicly exposed. 若要自訂圖像 （glyph），您可以建立自訂類別。To customize the glyph, you can create a custom class.

span.span: if the indicates there is an error; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出是否在資料列中的資料格的其中一個錯誤。The property indicates if there is an error in one of the cells in a row. 如果以外的其他設定的值，然後錯誤圖像 (![ErrorProvider 圖示](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider 圖示")) 顯示資料列標頭。If is set to a value other than , then an error glyph (![ErrorProvider icon](~/add/media/vberrorprovidericon.gif "ErrorProvider icon")) is shown in the row header. 資料列標頭的預設寬度會包含足夠的空間，以顯示錯誤圖像 （glyph），會顯示圖像 （glyph）。The default width of the row header includes enough room to display the error glyph, whether or not the glyph is displayed. 如果資料列的標頭大小會調整，讓沒有足夠的空間顯示完整的圖像，則不會呈現圖像 （glyph）。If the row header size is adjusted so that there is not enough space to display the glyph completely, the glyph is not rendered. 文字和圖像 （glyph），可顯示資料列標頭，因為標頭內容會顯示依優先順序，如下：Because row headers can display both text and glyphs, header content is displayed by priority, as follows: 1. 中的資料列標題儲存格所顯示的文字。Text displayed in the row header cell. 2. 編輯字符。The editing glyph. 3. 錯誤圖像 （glyph)。The error glyph. 比方說，如果資料列寬度就會減少，錯誤圖像 （glyph） 會消失第一次，然後標準字符，則文字。For example, if the row width is decreased, the error glyph disappears first, then the standard glyph, then text. 進階的使用者可以開發自訂的自訂錯誤字符或類別。Advanced users can customize the error glyph by developing a custom or class.

span.span: DataGridView Control (Windows Forms)

summary.span: 將 控制項的內容排序。

span.span: Sorts the contents of the control.

Public Overridable Sub Sort (comparer As IComparer)

summary.span: 使用 介面的實作，將 控制項的內容排序。

span.span: Sorts the contents of the control using an implementation of the interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓排序功能的進階的自訂類別。This method allows advanced customization of the sorting feature of the class. 若要實作高度自訂的排序作業，您可以撰寫事件處理常式事件和呼叫這個方法會實作類別的執行個體時做為參數的介面。In order to implement a highly customized sorting operation, you can write an event handler for the event and call this method with an instance of a class that implements the interface as a parameter. 在此情況下，您通常會設定屬性設停用自動排序，以及保留用於排序圖像的空間。In this case, you will typically set the property to to disable automatic sorting and to leave room for a sorting glyph. 排序時設定為以程式設計方式排序模式資料行，您必須顯示排序圖像 （glyph） 自行設定屬性。When sorting by columns set to programmatic sort mode, you must display the sorting glyph yourself by setting the property. 這個方法適用於只有當屬性未設定。This method works only when the property is not set. 當您繫結控制項至外部資料來源，您必須使用該資料來源所提供的排序作業。When you bind the control to an external data source, you must use the sorting operations provided by that data source. 當您提供您自己的資料來源的方式實作虛擬模式時，您也必須處理排序作業自己。When you provide your own data source by implementing virtual mode, you must also handle the sorting operations yourself. 呼叫這個方法會自動設定屬性設`null`。Calling this method automatically sets the property to `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用在多個資料行排序案例的方法多載。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method overload in a multiple column sort scenario. 在此範例中，介面實作在`RowComparer`類別。In this example, the interface is implemented in the `RowComparer` class. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewIComparerSort#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewIComparerSort/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewIComparerSort#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewIComparerSort/VB/form1.vb#10)]

summary.span: 根據指定資料行的內容，以遞增或遞減順序將 控制項的內容排序。

span.span: Sorts the contents of the control in ascending or descending order based on the contents of the specified column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的內容排序藉由比較指定的資料行中的值。This method sorts the contents of the by comparing values in the specified column. 根據預設，排序作業將會使用方法，在資料行中使用的儲存格的成對比較屬性。By default, the sort operation will use the method to compare pairs of cells in the column using the property. 對於具有資料行屬性設定為，則和屬性會自動設定，並顯示適當的排序圖像。For columns with the property set to , the and properties are set automatically and the appropriate sorting glyph is displayed. 對於具有資料行屬性設定為，您必須顯示排序圖像 （glyph） 自行透過屬性。For columns with the property set to , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 您可以自訂用這個方法所處理的排序作業事件。You can customize the sorting operation used by this method by handling the event. 只會發生此事件時屬性尚未設定。This event occurs only when the property has not been set. 當已設定屬性，這個方法適用於僅限繫結的資料欄。When the property has been set, this method works for data-bound columns only. 資料繫結資料行有其屬性集。Data-bound columns have had their property set. 這會導致屬性，以傳回`true`。This causes the property to return `true`. 如果您控制項包含繫結和解除繫結資料行，您必須實作虛擬模式，以維護未繫結的資料行的值，當控制項所繫結的資料行排序時。If your control contains both bound and unbound columns, you must implement virtual mode to maintain the values of the unbound columns when the control is sorted by a bound column. 您可以藉由設定屬性，以`true`和處理事件。You can do this by setting the property to `true` and handling the event. 如果資料行是可編輯的您也應該處理事件。If the column is editable, you should also handle the event. 如需有關虛擬模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to:實作虛擬模式中的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 不支援資料繫結控制項時，未繫結的資料行排序。Sorting by unbound columns when the control is data-bound is not supported. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用中以程式設計方式排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the in a programmatic sort. MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SortCompare As DataGridViewSortCompareEventHandler

summary.span: 發生在 比較兩個儲存格值來執行排序作業時。

span.span: Occurs when the compares two cell values to perform a sort operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只會發生此事件時未設定屬性和屬性值是`false`。This event occurs only when the property is not set and the property value is `false`. 這個事件會比較組排序的資料行中的資料格。This event compares pairs of cells in the column being sorted. 只有當使用者按一下資料行的標頭時，才發生屬性值，或當您呼叫多載。It occurs only when the user clicks the header of a column with a property value of , or when you call the overload. 當此事件發生時的資料行屬性值，您必須顯示排序圖像 （glyph） 自行透過屬性。When this event occurs for a column with a property value of , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 您可以使用這個事件來排序資料列或多個資料行中有一個資料行使用資料格的值。You can use this event to sort rows using the cell values in one column or in multiple columns. 使用並屬性，以比較儲存格的值，指定在資料行中屬性。Use the and properties to compare cell values in the column specified in the property. 使用並屬性來存取其他資料行中的值集合。Use the and properties to access values in other columns through the collection. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用在多個資料行排序。The following code example demonstrates how to use the in a multiple column sort. 這個範例屬於較大的範例中所提供的[How to:自訂 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項中的排序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。This example is part of a larger example provided in [How to: Customize Sorting in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-customize-sorting-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SortCompare/VB/form1.vb#10)]

summary.span: 發生在 控制項完成排序作業時。

span.span: Occurs when the control completes a sorting operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不會發生此事件時屬性設定為`true`和控制項所繫結的資料行排序。This event does not occur when the property is set to `true` and the control is sorted by an unbound column. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何確保完成排序之後，目前的儲存格為可見。The following code example illustrates how to ensure that the current cell is visible after sorting. 此程式碼僅適用於未繫結控制項。This code works only with an unbound control. 使用控制項繫結至外部資料來源，目前儲存格不會自動保存排序時。With a control bound to an external data source, the current cell is not automatically persisted when sorting. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，其中包含名為`dataGridView1`。To run this example, paste the following code into a form that contains a named `dataGridView1`. 在 C# 中，您也必須連接事件處理常式的事件。In C#, you must also connect the event to the event handler. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#150)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#150](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#150)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果未排序，這個屬性會傳回`null`。If the is not sorted, this property will return `null`. 當這個屬性所表示的資料行具有屬性值，它會顯示排序圖像 （glyph） 的值為基礎屬性。When the column indicated by this property has a property value of , it will display a sorting glyph based on the value of the property. 當資料行具有屬性值，您必須顯示排序圖像 （glyph） 自行透過屬性。When the column has a property value of , you must display the sorting glyph yourself through the property. > [!NOTE] > 當您排序控制項使用的自訂排序時，這個屬性的值不具意義。The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting. 如需有關自訂排序的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 方法和事件。For more information about custom sorting, see the method and the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用中以程式設計方式排序的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in a programmatic sort. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/VB/form1.vb#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用來判斷所指定的資料行時，會出現哪一個排序圖像屬性具有屬性值為。This property is used to determine which sorting glyph appears when the column specified by the property has a property value of . 當資料行具有屬性值，您必須顯示並自行隱藏排序圖像 （glyph），透過屬性。When the column has a property value of , you must display and hide the sorting glyph yourself through the property. 當資料行具有屬性值為，您可以顯示排序圖像 （glyph），但不是會保留空間，如果資料行自動調整大小。When the column has a property value of , you can display the sorting glyph, but space is not reserved for it if the column is automatically resized. > [!NOTE] > 當您排序控制項使用的自訂排序時，這個屬性的值不具意義。The value of this property is not meaningful when you sort the control using custom sorting. 如需有關自訂排序的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 方法和事件。For more information about custom sorting, see the method and the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用中以程式設計方式排序的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property in a programmatic sort. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/CS/form1.cs#10)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewProgrammaticSort/VB/form1.vb#10)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool StandardTab { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.StandardTab : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出 TAB 鍵是否會將焦點移到定位順序中的下一個控制項，而不是將焦點移到控制項中的下一個儲存格。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order rather than moving focus to the next cell in the control.

value.span: 如果 TAB 鍵會將焦點移到定位順序中的下一個控制項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the TAB key moves the focus to the next control in the tab order; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為`false`允許 TAB 鍵將焦點移到透過資料方格。Setting this property to `false` allows the TAB key to move the focus through the grid of cells. 下表描述如何儲存格的焦點變更時按下的指定索引標籤組合。The following table describes how the cell focus changes when the given TAB key combinations are pressed. |按鍵組合Key combination|結果Result| |---------------------|------------| |TABTAB|如果屬性是`false`，則焦點會移至下一步 的資料格的資料列中。If the property is `false`, the focus moves to the next cell in the row. 如果焦點是在資料列的最後一個資料格中，焦點會移至下一個資料列的第一個儲存格。If the focus is in the last cell in the row, the focus moves to the first cell in the next row. 如果焦點是在中的最後一個資料格，焦點會移至定位順序中的下一個控制項。If the focus is in the last cell in the , the focus moves to the next control in the tab order.| |SHIFT+TABSHIFT+TAB|如果是`false`，則焦點會移至資料列的上一個儲存格。If is `false`, the focus moves to the previous cell in the row. 如果焦點是在資料列的第一個資料格中，焦點會移到最後一個先前的資料列中的資料格。If the focus is in the first cell in the row, the focus moves to the last cell in the previous row. 如果焦點是在第一個資料格中，焦點會移至定位順序中的前一個控制項。If the focus is in the first cell in the , the focus moves to the previous control in the tab order.| |CTRL+TABCTRL+TAB|焦點移至定位順序中的下一個控制項。The focus moves to the next control in the tab order.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性可讓您設定儲存格的值、 關聯的捷徑功能表，或執行任何其他您可以針對執行的作業。Setting this property allows you to set a value for the cell, associate a shortcut menu with it, or perform any other operations you can perform on a . 在設計為從右至左的語言搭配使用的應用程式，這個屬性所表示儲存格通常是在右上角。In applications designed for use with right-to-left languages, the cell represented by this property is typically in the upper-right corner. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用這個屬性來顯示值的左上角控制項。The following code example uses this property to display a value in the upper-left corner of a control. 此值標籤的主從式案例中的子資料表。This value labels a child table in a master/detail scenario. 這個範例是提供之較大範例的一部分類別概觀主題。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview topic. summary.span: 強制位於指定位置的儲存格更新其錯誤文字。

span.span: Forces the cell at the specified location to update its error text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法，當您儲存格錯誤文字自行維護藉由處理事件。Use this method when you maintain cell error text yourself by handling the event. 當您變更指定的儲存格的預存的錯誤文字時，請呼叫這個方法。Call this method when you change the stored error text for the specified cell. 這會使失效的資料格，強迫控制項來擷取更新的錯誤文字透過事件處理常式。This will invalidate the cell, forcing the control to retrieve the updated error text through the event handler. 雖然您可以使用這個方法來更新標題儲存格的錯誤，則資料行的標頭資料格將不會顯示錯誤圖像 （glyph）。Although you can use this method to update errors for header cells, column header cells do not display error glyphs.

span.span: Forces the control to update its display of the cell at the specified location based on its new value, applying any automatic sizing modes currently in effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法，當您維持虛擬模式中的資料格的值，然後在您的自訂資料快取之外的更新值事件處理常式。Use this method when you maintain cell values in virtual mode and you update a value in your custom data cache outside of a event handler. 這個方法會導致無效的資料格中，強制要擷取新的值，透過控制項事件處理常式，並套用任何作用中的自動調整大小模式。This method invalidates the cell, forcing the control to retrieve the new value through the event handler and apply any automatic sizing modes that are in effect.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換具有或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DataGridView1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DataGridView1`. 請確定 與關聯的事件處理常式事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 虛擬模式被設計用於超大型存放庫資料。Virtual mode is designed for use with very large stores of data. 當屬性是`true`，您建立使用固定數目的資料列和資料行然後的控制代碼事件，以填入儲存格。When the property is `true`, you create a with a set number of rows and columns and then handle the event to populate the cells. 虛擬模式必須實作以處理母體擴展、 編輯和刪除基礎資料快取資料格會根據使用者的動作。Virtual mode requires implementation of an underlying data cache to handle the population, editing, and deletion of cells based on actions of the user. 如需有關實作虛擬模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to:實作虛擬模式中的 Windows Form DataGridView 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md)。For more information about implementing virtual mode, see [How to: Implement Virtual Mode in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-implement-virtual-mode-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). 您必須使用虛擬模式來維護未繫結的資料行的值時控制項是繫結模式。You must use virtual mode to maintain the values of unbound columns when the control is in bound mode. 不支援未繫結中繫結模式的資料行排序。Sorting by unbound columns in bound mode is not supported. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例程式碼會使用虛擬模式，來建立資料表的正整數。The following code example code uses virtual mode to create a table of positive integers. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/CS/virtual.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView._Virtual/VB/virtual.vb#0)]
